1a1(yum): yum chen mo bzhugs so//
1b1(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brta
1b2(yum): dum bu dag pa// bam po brgya nyer lnga pa// / ko'u shi ka gzhan
1b3(yum): yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
1b4(yum): 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas nas 'chang ba der stong gsum gyi ste
2a1(yum): / chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
2a2(yum): kye lnga'i du zan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par
2a3(yum): zhugs pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshem dang / dga' ldar dang
2a4(yum): thul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang kyi lha dang
2b1(yum): tshangs la nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / rlung snang dang /
2b2(yum): tshad med snang dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / chung med dge ba dang / dge rgyas
2b3(yum): dang che dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
2b4(yum): byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang der dong ning shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang / bzung ba dang /
2b5(yum): kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / 'dud pa byas shing phyir 'dod par sems so// gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi
2b6(yum): mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mtho dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bu de dag kyang der 'ong zhing
3a1(yum): zhes rab sdu ba la du phyin pa 'di klag pa dang / bzung bdang / bran chub pang byung dang / phyag rgyab dang /
3a2(yum): byas zhed byer 'dod padang sems so// kau ru gig phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen ban sa kyig bu dro mong pa'ang ngas pa
3a3(yum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / mche ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul
3a4(yum): dbang byed dang / tshangs ris kyi lnga dang / tshangs lnganye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tsa
3a5(yum): med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / rlung dag dang / chad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshang me
3a6(yum): che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris mi che
3b1(yum): mi gdung ba dang / shin du mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyir+g+ha dang / de ma yin pa'i dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang /
3b2(yum): ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lo 'phye chen po gzi brjid che bar bya mang po dag kyang der 'dong zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
3b3(yum): pa 'di klag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / 'dud pa byas shing phyir 'dod par sems so// koR+Ya shi ka rigs
3b4(yum): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis kyang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bani'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /
3b5(yum): sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mche ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga'o dang / gonan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris kye wa dang / tshangs lhan pa na dang /
3b6(yum): tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / chad med/
3b7(yum): dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / chang med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha bu na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
4a1(yum): yang dag par zhugs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba
4a2(yum): 'og min gyi lha dang / de ma yin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
4a3(yum): po gzi brjid chen po shi sna rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir
4a4(yum): lpags pa de dag la chos kyi sbyin pa 'di byin por gyur cig ces sems bskyed par bya ste/ de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klags pa dang //
4a5(yum): gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / mchod par byas shing / phyag byas te/ 'dud pa byas nas phyir 'dod do// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'a/
4a6(yum): rigs kyi bu mdo song gsum gyi song chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'do'i rgyal chetshon bani 'ongos kyi rnams dang / sum nu rtsa gsum dang / mche ma dang /
4a7(yum): dga' ldan dang / 'dul dga' dang / gnan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / changs na na dang / rdungs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen da
4a8(yum): snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che bad
4b1(yum): chung rje dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin du mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha'i thang/
4b2(yum): dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lnga dang / mtshe mi dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'a
4b3(yum): dga'i lce dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha ni phan gyi lha dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lnga dang / tshangs chen gyi lhang
4b4(yum): snang ba'i lha dang / chung snang gi lha dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lha dang / chung nga ge'i lha dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha dang /
4b5(yum): dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / chung che'i lha dang / tshad med che ba'i lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / mi che ba'i lha dang / mi gdung ba'i lha dang / shin
4b6(yum): du mtho ba'i lha dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha dang / 'og min gyi lha de dag kyang bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / bskyang bar byed de/ ko'u zhi ka de la las kyi rnam
4b7(yum): par smin pa ma gtogs par klags lta ba rnams kyis glags mi rnyed de/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des tshe 'dir yon tan 'di dag kyang /
4b8(yum): su drin par 'gyur ro// lnga'i bu gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang der shes rab kyi rol du phyin pa'angam
5a1(yum): mchod pa bya ba dang / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyang bar bya bar don du 'dod par sems pa/
5a2(yum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko ru shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ste/ sems can thams cad bsgrub
5a3(yum): pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sems can thams can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro// brgya byin gyis
5a4(yum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des 'dir phyogs cu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang
5a5(yum): gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / 'dud pa bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phung dud du bya ba dang / mchod par/
5a6(yum): bya ba'i phyir/ rgyal chen ba ni'i ris kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi bo dang / 'dir mtshe ma
5a7(yum): rnam mo 'angs sanas dkri ba dang / 'dir dga' ldan gyi m+b+ha rnams 'ongs kyi zhes bgyi dang / 'dir 'phrul ga'i rna rnams 'angs sa nas bskye ba dang / 'dar
5a8(yum): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'ongs so/
5b1(yum): zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir snang ba'i lha rnam
5b2(yum): 'ongs so zhes bla dang / 'dir chung gyi lnga rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'drar chad med snang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir kun snang dang nga'i
5b3(yum): rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir dge ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir chung dge'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshad med rje/
5b4(yum): rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir mi che
5b5(yum): ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir ma gdung ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /
5b6(yum): 'dir gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir 'og min gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
5b7(yum): bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang du gzhag par snang ba chen po byung bar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos mthong ni/ rigs
5b8(yum): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des der lha mthu chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba dbang che ba/ gzi brjid che ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang bcang ba dang
6a1(yum): kun chub par byed pa dang / phyag bya ba dang / 'dud par bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / bu dung du ru dang /
6a2(yum): ba'i phyir lpags so zhes bya bar nges par khong du chud par bya'o// ko'u shi ka gnan yang gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu ma gtsang sbra'i spyod ba dang ldan pa'i na de /
6a3(yum): gtsang sbra'i spyod pa des sgo de dag kyang nye bar 'ongs ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di klag pa dang / bzung ba dang / kun nub par bya ba dang / rim gror bya
6a4(yum): bkur bser bye ba dang / bu dung du bya ba dang / chod par byas nas shin du dgo' ba'i ming du 'gyur ro// gnas den lde mthu chud ngu ci snyed gnas pa de dag kyang
6a5(yum): lha'i bu mthu chen po mthu chen po de dag gi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang zil mi bzod pa'i phyir gnas de nas gud du 'dod pa sems so// ji lta ji ltar/
6a6(yum): mthu chen pa mthu chen po/ rdzu 'phrul che ba de dag nye bar 'ong bar sems pa de lha de ltar rigs kyi bla'am rigs kyi bu me de yang mes pargya chen po dud ldan pa/
6a7(yum): 'gyur ro// de'i gnas kyi 'khor sprin du yadru gtsung sgyu med pa'i spyod pa mi bgyid par byas te/ rigs kyi bu 'ami rigs kyi bu ma des shes rab kyi bai /
6a8(yum): tu byin pa 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi byi ri de'i gakhor gyis yang spos chus chag chag gis gad ba'o// me tog dang / spos kyis gtor ro// 'dugs
6b1(yum): 'thul ba'i gnod gzhag go/ dar g+hi lpa lI dang / gos kyi bla re bre'o// sa phyogs rnam pa du mas rgyan par bya'o// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs
6b2(yum): bu mo de la ngal zhing chad par 'gyur ba med de/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni lus bde ba dang / luste yang ba dang / lus gsal ba yang nyams su
6b3(yum): myong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des ni sems bde ba dang / sems yang ba dang / sems gsal ba yang nyams su myong bar 'gyur
6b4(yum): ro/ de nas nub mo nyal na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsam pas mos par byas nas sdig to'i rmi lam mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// des mthong
6b5(yum): na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba/ dpe byad bzang po
6b6(yum): brgyad bcus brgyan pa/ sku gser gyi mdog tu bzhugs pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kun nus bskor ba/ byang chub sems dpas mdun du bdar/
6b7(yum): ba/ chos ston pa mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de las 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
6b8(yum): dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
7a1(yum): byin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid
7a2(yum): drang don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas slong ba nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma
7a3(yum): med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa spyod pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad spyod pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang //
7a4(yum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar
7a5(yum): gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub
7a6(yum): yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / chad med pa
7a7(yum): rnams dang / gzugs med pa snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dang /
7a8(yum): dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong banyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzung /
7b1(yum): kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa ban+de dang / byams pa chen po dang /
7b2(yum): rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshe snga ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi chos bstan pa dang thos par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin de'i don rnam par bye ba ni/
7b3(yum): thos par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don dam par phying
7b4(yum): yang thos par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par
7b5(yum): phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de'i don rnams par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// nang song ba nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba
7b6(yum): yang thos par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par bye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro//
7b7(yum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de'i don par bye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid de'i don dam par byed thos par 'gyur ro// don dam stong pa nyid de'i
7b8(yum): don dam par bye ba thos par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid de'i don dam par phye bar 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de'i don dernam par bya
8a1(yum): yang thos par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de'i don phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid de'i ngan
8a2(yum): rnam par bye ba thos par 'gyur ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos
8a3(yum): 'gyur ro// chos thams cad spyong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye yang thos par 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa
8a4(yum): stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rna
8a5(yum): par bye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de'i don rnam par phye
8a6(yum): yang thos par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par bye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par bye ba yod/
8a7(yum): nges par 'gyur ro// dbang po lnga po de dag ga rnam par bye ba mang thos par 'gyu'o// thangs sde pa dag go ni rnam par bye bris par 'gyur ro// byang chub
8a8(yum): yan lag bdun po de dag gdin rnam par bye ba yang bris par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag gi rin rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro//
8b1(yum): 'khrugs pa'i bden pa ban po de dag gi don rnam par bye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par bye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// chang rung
8b2(yum): ba ni pa de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// rnam/
8b3(yum): par thar pa brgyad pa de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par
8b4(yum): 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa de dag
8b5(yum): gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos
8b6(yum): par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba thos par
8b7(yum): 'gyur ro/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// sarba/
8b8(yum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi shing yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sem
9a1(yum): dpa' chen po byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
9a2(yum): par 'tshang rgya ba yang mngon par 'gyur ro// de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems//
9a3(yum): dpa' brgya stong mang po chos yang dag par 'gro ba byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid na 'di ltar yongs su bsgrub par bya'o// sems can mang po ni 'di ltar
9a4(yum): yongs su smin par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni 'di ltar yongs su gzung bar bya'o// bdud 'khor dang bcas po ni 'di ltar pham par bya'o// zhes zer ba
9a5(yum): dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// shas phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhigan ni
9a6(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che gre mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang /
9a7(yum): 'di snyed cig dang nyan thos bye ba theg khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston ti zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// lce phyogs
9a8(yum): kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya song mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi ngoms che ge mo zhigan ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang sa
9b1(yum): bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya song mang po 'di snyed cig dang /
9b2(yum): thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya spyong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// nub phyogs kyi sangs
9b3(yum): rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
9b4(yum): ba'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston
9b5(yum): to/ zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya spong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge
9b6(yum): mo zhig na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig
9b7(yum): brgya stong mang po 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par
9b8(yum): 'gyur ro/ bya shar gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni
10a1(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
10a2(yum): khrig brgya stong mang po 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun tu byas te chos ston to// zhes byas pa'i sgra tho
10a3(yum): par 'gyur ro// shar l+le'i phyogs 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig nan
10a4(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang ba
10a5(yum): 'di snyed cig dang / kun thos kyi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// rnam
10a6(yum): kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba zag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mi zhig nan de bzhin gshegs pa
10a7(yum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po 'di snyed cig dang /
10a8(yum): nyan thos bye ba khrag zig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ chos son to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// nub byang gi phyogs pa ma
10b1(yum): gyisangs rgyas bye ba khrag theg brgya sdong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par/
10b2(yum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig pa
10b3(yum): stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya sto
10b4(yum): mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge/
10b5(yum): mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gi
10b6(yum): bskor cing mdun du byas te/ chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par
10b7(yum): 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo nig na nI de bzhi gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugasa~M te/ byang chub
10b8(yum): sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos
11a1(yum): son to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa/
11a2(yum): dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar
11a3(yum): 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang //
11a4(yum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par
11a5(yum): bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin
11a6(yum): gshegs pa de dag mchod rten rin po chesna bdun las pabye ba khrag khrig brgya sa dmang bdag mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dngag
11a7(yum): me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdun dang / mchod pas
11a8(yum): tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bsed bya ba dang / bu dung du bye ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba
11b1(yum): khrig brgyas mang thoyongs su mya ngan las 'da' bdag kyang mthong bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod don dag kyang me ga dang / bas rje
11b2(yum): dang bdugs spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror byang
11b3(yum): bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu drung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya
11b4(yum): ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po de
11b5(yum): dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma
11b6(yum): ma dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phung dung
11b7(yum): du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas byed khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'dzig
11b8(yum): bdag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong
12a1(yum): bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang /
12a2(yum): bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dung du
12a3(yum): bye ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// shar phyogs 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bdag kyang
12a4(yum): mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bye ba zag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro//
12a5(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdugs spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdun
12a6(yum): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dang / mchong bsna tshogs mang pos rim gror byung dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / zung dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya/
12a7(yum): mthong bar 'gyur ro// lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshabs kyi sangs rgyas bye ga khrag khrig brgya song meng po yongs sumya ngan las 'di'i bdag kyang mthong 'gyur
12a8(yum): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bye ga khrag khrig brgya song mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
12b1(yum): gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang / me tog dang / spos dang / phred pa dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na baba' dang / gdugs dang /
12b2(yum): rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dang / mchod pasna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir byi ba dang / phu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bye ba mthong /
12b3(yum): bar 'gyur ro// nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya spong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/
12b4(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gsheg
12b5(yum): pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdugo spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
12b6(yum): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / bud dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong ba
12b7(yum): 'gyur ro/ 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang / mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
12b8(yum): gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna ba dun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
13a1(yum): pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog/ spros dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rdul
13a2(yum): mtshan dang / bdan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / bu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par byab mthong bar 'gyur
13a3(yum): steng ge phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba bdag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
13a4(yum): rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spros dang / phreng ba dang / bdug smos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rdul mtshan dang / bdan /
13a5(yum): mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos ram 'gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba da / bu drang du bro ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka de ltar
13a6(yum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi rmi lam bzang po de lta bu dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ de dag bde bar zhal zhing bde bar ldang bar 'gyur ro//
13a7(yum): 'i sa kyang mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur lus la yang ba'i rnam pa med par 'gyur// skye ba rnams med par 'gyur/ bsal chen na shes pa med par /
13a8(yum): gos chags pa med par 'bye na gyi rkyen sran dang / ma byed ma chags pa med par 'gyur/ mas kyi 'dushes rung bar 'gyur/ thos kyi 'dunas rlung /
13b1(yum): 'gyur/ nad kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dper na rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i dge slong ting nge 'dzin masas /
13b2(yum): pa'i sems med la byas pas yongs su brlan pa la/ bsal cher chags pa med pa yin/ zas kyi 'du shes chung ba yin no// ko'u shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi
13b3(yum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang zas la cher chags pa med par 'gyur ro// zas kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la mi ma yin pa rnams lus
13b4(yum): la mdangs nye bar bsgrub pa/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang klu dang //
13b5(yum): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ci sbed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub pa
13b6(yum): lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ci snyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ci snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
13b7(yum): nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po gang ci snyed pa de dag kyang de la'i lus la mdangs nye bar bsgrub bo// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
13b8(yum): gang ci snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ci snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / me'am
14a1(yum): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ci snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la nangs nye bar bsgrub bo// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
14a2(yum): gang ni sred pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ci snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi
14a3(yum): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ci snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
14a4(yum): gang ni snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ci snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' spring dang /
14a5(yum): 'di bzung snyed pa lus sa ma dang sa / ga 'i phyogs rnams kyi sangs rgyas bcin ldan
14a6(yum): gang ni skyed pa dang/ rlung chu sa pe ga byed du dang / lha dang / zu nga / dod sbyin dang / dri dang / lA ma yin dang / nam ma'a' sa
14a7(yum): kyin sa
14a8(yum): sa ma chen dzin blang pa 'a na pa tshu ma
14b1(yum): nga snyed pa dang / wA kA / mkha' lding dang / l-I'i phye chen po dang / gang ci srid pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mngangs bar sbya na
14b2(yum): phyogs tshems kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ci snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ci sbeng pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin nga /
14b3(yum): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar bsgrub po/
14b4(yum): 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ci skyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ci snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ci snyed pa dang //
14b5(yum): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ci skyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la
14b6(yum): mdangs nye bar sgrub po// steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ci snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ci skyed pa dang / lha dang / klung
14b7(yum): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag de'i lus la mdangs nye bur sgrung po// ko'u zhi ka
14b8(yum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo tshe 'di nyid la yon tan 'di dag yongs su gzung bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nan tan du mnyan pa
15a1(yum): bya'o// gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// klag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
15a2(yum): bcid kyi sems dang yang mi 'bral byar bya'o// kau'u ga ka de lta so rigs kyi dru'am rigs kyi du mo dag gis shes rab hU~M pha rol tu phyin pa 'drim bzug sa nga
15a3(yum): maklags/ kun chub par ma byas/ tshul bzhin du yid lam byas na'ang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bris shing
15a4(yum): glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshar dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs
15a5(yum): kyis rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// bu dung ngu bya'o// mchod par bya'o// ko ru shi ka de ltar rigs kyi bu mo de'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'gro ba mang pol
15a6(yum): ngan pa dang / 'gro ba mang po la bde ba'i don du zhugs pa yin/ koru shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bzung ba da /
15a7(yum): bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par byed dang / rdul bzhin du yid la byed cing zlos te me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang /
15a8(yum): dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'dzin dang / sams na mtshigs kyis rim gyir byed/ bkur babar byed/ phudung du byed/ mi tshong bar byos rag
15b1(yum): 'a ba bas kyi ma dar ba ma nams chis ma du'ab byags 'dudun gyi 'dus rten gyi'abs nang na panagasupa ngas gas
15b2(yum): ba'i sangs rgyas can gyis kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pas bzhugs pa rnams la nam 'tshe'i bar du bda' dang / bskos dang / gzims ca dang / brnyan gyi sbyin
15b3(yum): dang / yo byad mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dung du byas/ mchod par byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
15b4(yum): pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas po de dag mya ngan las 'das nas kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten las byas brtsigs te/
15b5(yum): na mtsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang //
15b6(yum): sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur baspyir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas pas ni ma yin no// shes
15b7(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu gnyis so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/
15b8(yum): shi ka khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gang ba zhig kyang steng shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la glegs bam du/
16a1(yum): bris pa zhig kyang la las byin na de las gang blang bar bya/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te/ bdag 'jam/
16a2(yum): bu'i gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur bgram pa zhig kyang la las sprul/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris pa nig
16a3(yum): kyang la las stsal na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid dag gis blang bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
16a4(yum): gdung de dag la rim gro ma mchis pa yang ma logs/ mi rten pa yang ma lags/ btsun par mi bgyid pa yang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni
16a5(yum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gror bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba 'am/ kur bser bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba'am/ phra dung du bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba'am/ mchog
16a6(yum): par bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba yang ma lags// ston pa yang ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
16a7(yum): phyin pa 'di las byung ba ste/ de ci'i slang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams kyang rim gror bgyi ba lags/ bkur bstir 'gye ba lags/ bu dung du
16a8(yum): bgyi lags/ mchid bar bgyi ba lags/ sdu gdung de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas bsgrubs pa ste/ de'i srang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
16b1(yum): dag kyang mchod pamanga' dra lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam bdas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung ba zhwardzas kyi me dog dang / wa rdzas kyi rjeng ba dang /
16b2(yum): smos pa dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyin bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzus kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi 'ang/
16b3(yum): dang lha rdzas kyi sil sman sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid cing bkur bstir bgyid pa dang / phu dung du bgyid pa dang / mtshang bar bgyid pa'i tshe yang dri ba nir gzhan
16b4(yum): pa'i sku gdung 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba lags na lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rim gror bgyi ba lags/ bku
16b5(yum): stir bgyi ba lags/ phu dud du bgyi lags/ mchod par bgyi ba lags pas/ bsrung zhing rim gror dang / bkur sti dang / phu dung khyi dang / mchod par brtse
16b6(yum): do/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzung du med pa/ gzugs
16b7(yum): med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa yin na/ de la khyod ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung du med
16b8(yum): pa/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid me gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa la gzugs par sems/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
17a1(yum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni 'dzin bdud/ dor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin/ 'grib pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'phel ba
17a2(yum): ma yin// bskyed pa'i phyir ma yin/ bskyang ba'i phyir ma yin/ po ston pa'i phyir ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir ma yin/ rnam par bya ba'i phyir ma lon
17a3(yum): rnam par byang ba'i phyir ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i cho
17a4(yum): rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams che bar sgrub pa ma yin/ na thos kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ slob ba dang mi
17a5(yum): nga'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings zhi bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas
17a6(yum): kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bzod du'i
17a7(yum): pha rol tu phyin byege par sgru bangar pa men/ 'jor 'grus kyi rol du byin zin par sgrub pas nan/ bsam gtan gyi rol tu na pace bar sna 'bam
17a8(yum): gis kyi ma kyi 'a grub sa tshu mamam kyi sa sa pa la pa mad kyi ba
17b1(yum): dman yang bcad snang ba sa par sdur bya mtshan/ chen ma grang ban bang sgrub pa ma man/ na ma pa srung bas ba sgru 'angs smras
17b2(yum): banyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tham med /
17b3(yum): stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang bzhin spong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid
17b4(yum): nye bar sgrub pa ma yi ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nye bar smrab pa ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo ny-i
17b5(yum): bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid nye bar sgrub pa me yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams cig
17b6(yum): sgrub pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams nye bar sgrub pa
17b7(yum): ma yin/ stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nye bar sgrub
17b8(yum): pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
18a1(yum): pa rnams nye bar sgrub bu ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams ge bar sgrubapa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
18a2(yum): nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa cing dang / mtshan ma med pa drang sngon po med panye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams nye bar sna
18a3(yum): pa ma smin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams che bar sgrub pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snabs rnams bar sgru
18a4(yum): pa ma yin/ ma 'jigs pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams che bar sgrub pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po'i bar sgrub pa ma yin/
18a5(yum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rgyun tu chugs pa'i 'bras bunye bar sgrub pa ma min/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras drin par sgrub pas
18a6(yum): yin+da phyir mi 'ang 'bras bunye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid nye bar sgru pa ma yin/ rang byang chubanye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam par sa
18a7(yum): ci par sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying nye bar sgrub pa mtshan/ brgya byin gyis sbas pa/ bcur bshar dwa ti'i bude de bzhin no//
18a8(yum): bzhin te/ btsun pa shar ma dza'i bug gis ras zhesarab kyi pha rol rje rkyen pan sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams pa bar sgrub pa ma mam mi ma myi /
18b1(yum): rnams 'dod par byed pa ma man/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pam man/ rAng sa smra rgyas rgyas rnams ba sgru ba maman
18b2(yum): chos rnams sde bar sgrub pa ma yin/ sgrub pa dang mi slob pa 'ichos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye ba'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma ldad/ dzu
18b3(yum): ma byas kyi dbyings nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chul
18b4(yum): khrims kyi rol du phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nang steng brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar
18b5(yum): sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub
18b6(yum): pa ma yin no// bye stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub po ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chen po
18b7(yum): mo stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa
18b8(yum): nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ngor ba med pa
19a1(yum): stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
19a2(yum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub be ma yin/
19a3(yum): bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
19a4(yum): yang dag par spong ba rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ stobs
19a5(yum): rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad bzhi bar sgrubab ma yin/ 'phags par/
19a6(yum): bden pa rnams kyi bar sgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
19a7(yum): 'dug pa rnams de bar sgrubapa ma 'an/ mthar gyis garnas pa'i rnams par 'jug pa rnams sa par sgrub ba ma yin// rnam par thar ba'i ma spong bzhi dang mtsham
19a8(yum): med pa dang ston pa med pazhi bar sgrub pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sa rnam
19b1(yum): sgo rnams par sgrub pa mtshan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa sa yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ sa so yang das brdzun/
19b2(yum): pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ snying rje chen ponye bar sgrubapa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrubab mo yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu che
19b3(yum): sgrub pa ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrib pa ma yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgru' pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa zhi zhi bar sgrub pa ma yin/
19b4(yum): byang chub nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin no zhes bya bar shes pa de ni na
19b5(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ni gnyis su med shes par bya ba ma yin te/
19b6(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nye ba/
19b7(yum): mi gnyis pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// bzod pa'i pha
19b8(yum): rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma
20a1(yum): yin te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
20a2(yum): pa ni mig ni sa pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po rgya byin la lags so bya ba gnang ste/ ko'u shi ka legs so lags so// de de bzhin tongo tso skad smras pa
20a3(yum): bzhin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// bsam gtan gyi ba
20a4(yum): rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis
20a5(yum): su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na// 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ni
20a6(yum): phyir zhe na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su zhes par bya ba ma yin te/ rdo ci'i phyir nan/ tshul khrims kyi
20a7(yum): r-il tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa ni gces su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir che na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// dz+ra
20a8(yum): ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du'ang ngo // de tso'i phyir ne na/ ko'u shig de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings
20b1(yum): dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su byar med do// ko ru shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa deni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su
20b2(yum): 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko ru shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus
20b3(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang brtson
20b4(yum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dpyid/
20b5(yum): la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med
20b6(yum): do/ ko'u shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u sha~M ka dwe ni/
20b7(yum): 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings drang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis
20b8(yum): su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dadong sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la
21a1(yum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shaM ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su med
21a2(yum): 'dod du 'ang do// de ci'i phyir na na/ ko'u shi kAng ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// \u0f7f
21a3(yum): ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shaM ka ni 'di ltar bsam
21a4(yum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang de bzhin nyid gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/
21a5(yum): de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med deg
21a6(yum): su byar med do// kro Ta shrI ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis 'dod du bang // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'u na
21a7(yum): nI 'di ltar bstong ba'i rol tu phyin pa dang de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med dganas su med da gnyis su byur med do// korba na ka gang tshul khrims kyi rom du
21a8(yum): phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir ne na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang de /
21b1(yum): nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// koR+Ya shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dong bden de bzhin cing lu gnyis su 'jod dum na/
21b2(yum): phyir zhe na/ ko& shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang rong bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko ru zhi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol
21b3(yum): tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
21b4(yum): yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha'
21b5(yum): la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis
21b6(yum): su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhen
21b7(yum): ko& shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol
21b8(yum): tu byin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
23a1(yum): tu phyin pa 'di ni lha dang mi dang ldu ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi phyag bgyi bar 'os par ste/ de la bslabs pas ni byang chub sems
23a2(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rtogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rtogs par 'tshang rgya'o/
23a3(yum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag chos bzang po'i lha'i 'khor du bdag nyid kyi lnga'i dbang po'i sman la mchis par 'gyur ba
23a4(yum): de'i tshe/ der lha'i bu gang 'di snyed cig bdag gis rim grol mchis pa de dag kun kyang bdag la mchod par bgyid de/ nam bdag der ma mchis zhing san de la ma mchis
23a5(yum): pade'i tshe'ang / lha'i bu de dag 'a khor der mchis 'ang lha'i dbang po rgya byin sman 'di la 'dug cing sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la chos son to// zhes san de la
23a6(yum): g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bgyis shig phyag 'tshal te srar mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris zhing 'chang ba dang /
23a7(yum): kha ton du ba gyid ci gzhan la rgya cheran ston pa der phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ mA dang k+Sha dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri zo dang / lha ma min dang / rnams
23a8(yum): ldi dang ma'am ci dang / mi 'am chi nga lo'i phye chen po tsho snyid cig mchis pa de dag kyang de bzhi gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
23b1(yum): rnams ni de las byung ngo // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'dri las 'byung ngo // sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang 'dil sa
23b2(yum): 'byung ngo zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag bgyis shing 'dud pa bgyis nas/ slar mche bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
23b3(yum): gdung rnams mchod pa mnga' ba yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su sgrubs pa'i slad du mchod pa mnga' ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das drung
23b4(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bzhir gyur te/
23b5(yum): rgyur to/ rkyen du gyur to// yongs su sgrub gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na cha de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to//
23b6(yum): bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid blangs te/ chos kyi khongs su rtogs pa'i yid kyis kha ton du bgyid pa de'i tshe/ 'jig
23b7(yum): pa'am bag tshwa ba'i mtshan ma tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchi/
23b8(yum): rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan
24a1(yum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod dum mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das pasam gtan gyi
24a2(yum): rol tu phyin pa ni spos sum mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa /
24a3(yum): bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sgras su ma mchis de'o// bcom ldan 'das brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis chags ma
24a4(yum): mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
24a5(yum): mtshan mam mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan/
24a6(yum): 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma mamachis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos
24a7(yum): ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ rtag sa ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das na stong bzhid ni
24a8(yum): mtshan ma thos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa saM/ bcom ldan 'das skyes
24b1(yum): nyid ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis paste/ bcom ldan 'das phyin
24b2(yum): stong pa nyid ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod dus mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das spong ba ni
24b3(yum): stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'ang/
24b4(yum): chen po stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid ni ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
24b5(yum): don dam pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis ste/ bcom/ ldan 'das
24b6(yum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/
24b7(yum): bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa steng pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags mchis
24b8(yum): brjod du ma mchis pa si/ bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod dur mchis pa ste/ bcon ldan
25a1(yum): 'das mtha' las pa stong pa nyid ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchi
25a2(yum): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dor ba ma mchis med pa stong pa nyid ni chan
25a3(yum): ma ma mchis rdugs ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong ba nyid
25a4(yum): ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos tham
25a5(yum): cad stong pa nyid ni mnan mamachis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong ba nyid ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan
25a6(yum): 'das rang gi mtshan nyid song ba nyid de ni mtshan ma ma mchis rdzogs ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su
25a7(yum): ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du mi mchis paste/ bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs /
25a8(yum): song bzhid ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong panyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis chags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa sa/ bcom
25b1(yum): na 'das dad pa'i med pa snang banyid ni sras su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das cad spyod pa'i na can mamamachis dgas ma bcas brjod dums pa ra
25b2(yum): bcom ldan 'das ngo cing ni spos sum mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i je bo zhid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis chags ma mchis brjod du
25b3(yum): mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo cid stong pa nyid ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams ni mtshan ma mchi
25b4(yum): rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams
25b5(yum): ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rdzu
25b6(yum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// ban
25b7(yum): ldan 'das dbang po rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan
25b8(yum): 'das stobs rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan
26a1(yum): bcom 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi ma/
26a2(yum): lag rnams ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'bags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa /
26a3(yum): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags
26a4(yum): ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams ni mtshan
26a5(yum): ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chang med pa rnams
26a6(yum): ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzugs
26a7(yum): med pa rnams par 'jug pa rnams na mtshamams mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis / bcom ldan 'das gardugs med pa'i khrims par 'phrul
26a8(yum): rnams kyi ses su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan das rnams pa pa rnams nim tshan mam mchis rtags mchis brjid du ma mchis pas/ bcom ldan nga
26b1(yum): rnam par thar pa rnams na spos sum mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mapar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis dgas ma sa
26b2(yum): du ma bachis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni spos su mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo spong
26b3(yum): nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo spong bye mtshan ma
26b4(yum): med pa me dang smon pa med pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste
26b5(yum): bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma
26b6(yum): mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis
26b7(yum): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni mtshan
26b8(yum): ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'dra
27a1(yum): mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams spos su
27a2(yum): ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das so so
27a3(yum): yang dag par rig pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom
27a4(yum): ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/
27a5(yum): brjod dus ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres rnams spos sum mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa zhid nimatshan mam
27a6(yum): mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das las rnam pa ces
27a7(yum): cid gi tshanamam mchis rtags ma mchis brjod dum mchis pa sre/ bcom ldan 'das lamagyi rnam pa zhes pazhidi ni sras sum mchis pa'o// bcom
27a8(yum): 'das las gyi rnam pa shes pa'i ni mtshan ma mamachis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam par shes pa /
27b1(yum): sa sum mchis na// ma ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad rkyen pacad na mtshan mam mchis dgas ma mchis brjid dum mams /
27b2(yum): 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa nigal
27b3(yum): mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma lags na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis thams cad la mtshan ma ma mchis dang / dag
27b4(yum): ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
27b5(yum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can thams cad la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ smos su ma mchis
27b6(yum): pa'i chos ston to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis smos su ma mchis pa
27b7(yum): de'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang smos su pa thugs su/
27b8(yum): chud de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma
28a1(yum): mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pa'i chos ston to// bcom ldan 'das de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
28a2(yum): ni lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan/
28a3(yum): ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur bste dang / pu dung du bya ba dang / mchod pa bgyid par 'os pa'o// bris shing me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang /
28a4(yum): byug pa dang / spos dang / bye ma dang / na brda' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i bdun dang / sel snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang
28a5(yum): br-i dung dang / mched pa bgyid par 'os pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang lal nig zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / sreg cing kun chub
28a6(yum): dang tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / de bris shing mi tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug po dang / bye ma dang / na brda' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
28a7(yum): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid/ bkur stir bgyid/ dri drung ngu bgyod/ mchod par babyed na/ de ni nAmathun med pa
28a8(yum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar drings sems can dkyil rje'i rgyu kya dgas pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// khyim ra/
28b1(yum): gsuM gnas dang / bzhin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rlung kyi dgas pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// can thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis ririgs pa ma mchis par bcag/
28b2(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi bral bar 'gyur/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang / yang mi bral bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
28b3(yum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
28b4(yum): ngan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / pu dud du dang / mchod pa bgyid cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi ning du mchi bar 'gyur/
28b5(yum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis bya bur lham pa zhig kyang stsal
28b6(yum): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa 'di yang bris te stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len te//
28b7(yum): bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams te/ de bas na de bzhin gsheg
28b8(yum): pa'i sku gdung de dag rim gror bgyi ba dang / bkur stir bgyi ba dang / phu dung du bgyi zhing mchod pa bgyi ba lags te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis
29a1(yum): de dag la rim 'gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ bu drud du gyis/ mchod par bgyis na log par ltung ba dang / ngan song du mchi bar mi/
29a2(yum): 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myed nas/ smon lam gyi tshul bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa
29a3(yum): sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na gang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
29a4(yum): byiphyin pa bris pa mthong ba de ni mi 'dra ba ma mchis so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pal
29a5(yum): gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
29a6(yum): 'bru rnam pagasasapa brgyugs te/ 'ad dang dbyungs kyi skyed dang / lung du ldan pa da/ gas smra yang ba dang / ched du brjid pa dang / gleng bani dang/
29a7(yum): lngar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin du rgyas pa dang / chos rmang du d+hi dwe dang / rtags pa brjid ba dang / rjes gan la dbang bstan pa gsungs
29a8(yum): bzang ba dang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo la las zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ning kun chub par bgyis de gzhan la snyan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma
29b1(yum): mchis so/ bam ldan 'das pa'i sdud du zhen/ 'dulas byung ba ba na bshegs padag 'am pa sa ga par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas rna
29b2(yum): ban tshe 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo// 'di las byung ba ni mad dang dbyangs kyis sdang pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / lung dus na pa dang / cheng du brjod pa dang / 'dzin
29b3(yum): dang 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin du rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos btan la dbang bstan pa'o//
29b4(yum): bcom ldan 'das gnan yang shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra brtse
29b5(yum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang phyogs kyi de bzhin
29b6(yum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang
29b7(yum): rgyas dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gsheg
29b8(yum): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
30a1(yum): rgyas dang / 'og ga phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag 'artsom pa yang dag par rdzobs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / steng gi phyogs kyang btsun
30a2(yum): gshegs pa da ma pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs nas gang gtu rlung ga bye byeng ba nam dru'i ma gsum rlabs / mang gyu
30a3(yum): snang pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / lung du snyan pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng bzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa
30a4(yum): dang chos skad du byung ba dang / rtogs par brjod pa dang / chos stan la dbab bstan pa gsung ste/ bshad pa dang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes
30a5(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/ gnan la snyan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slang du chen/ 'jilas byung ba ni phyi
30a6(yum): bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni tshe 'phrug rnam pa gasnam po 'di las byung ba
30a7(yum): mad nga dbyangs kyis spang ba dang / lung du sman pa dang / tshigs su dang / cheng du brjod pa dang / gle bani dang / 'di la' 'das pa dang /
30a8(yum): pa'i rabs dang / shin du rgyas pa dang / chos rmang du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la dba' bstan zan// bcom ldan 'das sa
30b1(yum): yang byugs bcu'i phyogs re re'i gang ga'i klung gi byem snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stod pa'i na gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs panas smyan+d+han
30b2(yum): de bzhin dgal me tog dang / phreng ba dang / sris dong / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / nu bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshar dang / den dang
30b3(yum): spyan dang sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs dam du
30b4(yum): bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / blangan dang / sil snyanA ste
30b5(yum): tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang d+mad dang / mchod pa bgyis pa yang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin
30b6(yum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes
30b7(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzer dang / 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing gzhan la yang rgya cher
30b8(yum): ston pa des ni sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs ma mchis par bgyi'o// byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa
31a1(yum): ba ma mchis par 'gyu'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dogs pa ma mchis par bgyur// de ci'i slad du rten/ 'di ltar rig
31a2(yum): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mngon phyir mi ldog pa'i sal gnas par 'gyi'o// de ci'i slad du na na/ 'di ltar de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris zhing 'dzim
31a3(yum): 'chang ngo klog go// kun chub par bgyid do// tshul bzhin du yid lnga bgyid do// bris pa de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dong / byug pa dang phye ma dang /
31a4(yum): na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid/ bkur ser bgyid/ phu dzu dung gyid/ mchod
31a5(yum): bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de ni 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bkye'o// na thams cad rab tu selwa ba'o// bcom ldan
31a6(yum): 'das de lta gzhan yang dgas kyi bu'amarigs kyi drub gang shes rlung kyi rol tu phyin pa'adi rjes zhing dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang/ thob pa dang / du rdzos
31a7(yum): byar brjod pa/ dril me tog dang / phreng ba da d+hIn pa dang / sa da na nga dang / gzusas dang / rgyul mtshan dang / nga dang / semams /
31a8(yum): tshogs kyis rim gro dang / 'akur ste dang / bu dud dang / mchod par bgyis pa des ni de la gang ga nas kyang 'jigs pa 'byung ba dgas pa ma mchis par gyi
31b1(yum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na skyes du nor gyi bdag pa zhig 'jigs nas rgyal po la gnas cing / rgyal po la rten nas/ rgyal po la gnas shing rgyal po
31b2(yum): pas sus 'jigs pa de dag nyid kyang de la rten pas de dag gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i snang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das deni 'di lta ga
31b3(yum): gang rgyal po de la rten pa ni mthu dang ldan pa la rten pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
31b4(yum): pas yongs su bsgrubs pas na mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang lags pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
31b5(yum): pas yongs su snabs par lta'o// bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag gis tshad gnyis las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid blang bar bgyi'o// bcom
31b6(yum): ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so//
31b7(yum): 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o// 'di las byung ba ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'o// 'di las byung ba ni so sa/
31b8(yum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o// 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do// 'di las byung ba ni byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'o//
32a1(yum): bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni pha rol tu phyin palnga'o// de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i mang thob pa// 'di las byung ba ni de ban pa rgya
32a2(yum): pa'i rnam pa rnams du pa 'ing skye bar du sa/ ldan 'das stong ngas myong rkye ram+bu/ rnam las/ 'amasasas/ rgyal ba'i gnasas pa/
32a3(yum): gsum gyi snong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangan pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid ba dang /
32a4(yum): de bris shing rim gro dang / bkur ste dang / bu dud dang / mchod par bgyid pa de dag du mi'am mi lags pa grags lnga zhing grags tshol ba rnams kyis klags rnyed pa
32a5(yum): mi 'gyur te/ sems can de drug thams cad kyang theg pa gsum las theg pa gang yang rung bas mthar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du 'gyur
32a6(yum): bcom ldan 'das de ltabs nas shes rab rje pha rol du phyin pa 'di don chen po dang ldan pa ste/ snong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na des
32a7(yum): sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi don duche bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang na zhes rab kyi pa rol tu byin pa 'di mchis pa'i
32a8(yum): 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ni sangs rgyas byung ba dang 'dra bar lnga'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dzis me dper na/ nor bu rin po che mi dpags rin padzin ces
32b1(yum): ba mchis te/ der nor bu rin po che chen po'i yon tan rnams pa de la bu dag dang ldan te/ nor bu rin po che chen po gang du ba nag pa de dang der mi ma lags pa rnam
32b2(yum): kyis klags mi rnyeng ngo // mi ma lags pas zin pa'i skyes pa'am bung med kyang nir bu rin po che de bstan na mi ma lags pa de nor bu rin po che chen po dang gzi
32b3(yum): mi bzod do// myur du 'pho zhing mi gnas so khris pas gdungs pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na khris pa de yang byang bar 'gyur ro// rlung gis
32b4(yum): mnar ba'i lus la nor bu rin po che de btags na rlung de yang byang bar 'gyur ro// bad kan gyis non pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de bdags pa ni/ bar
32b5(yum): kand yang byang bar 'gyur ro// 'dus pa'i bros btab pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ 'dus pa'i blo de yang zhi bar 'gyur zhing rnam par mi
32b6(yum): 'phel lo// nub mo ni snang bar bgyid do// tsha ba'i dus na rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du gzhag pa'i phyogs de bskul bar 'gyur ro// grang ba'i dus na/
32b7(yum): ni nor bu rin po chen chen po de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i bregs de dro bar bgyid do// nor bu rin po che chen po de dog sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs
32b8(yum): bcang mdzo'o// bcang yang mitha ning ngan pa phun su ma tshogs par bgyu // ne bu riri po che chen po rigs phyogs gang du brnaMs pa'i dzis pa'i
33a1(yum): der sprul lam de ma lags pa'i sdig pa'i las sogs pa gdug pa gnon dag kyang rku bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor/
33a2(yum): bla rin po che chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag dang ldan te/ skyes pa'i bud med la la 'brum bus pa de 'am/ mig ba bcan du 'gyur te/
33a3(yum): gi nad dum/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam/ lkog nad dam/ lus kyi nang cing byung ba las de'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na
33a4(yum): de dag gi 'bru bu'am/ rab rib bam/ mig gi nid dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i na dang ma/ lce'i ni ngam/ lkog ma'i nad dam/ lus kyi nang de dag kyang ni
33a5(yum): bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po sbyin pa de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang yang ldan te/ gal te ner bu rin po che chen po de chu ba rno/
33a6(yum): bcan gyi nang du stsal na/ de'i mad la chab de thams cad kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan nipa kha do gcig par 'gyur ro// gal te nar bu rin po che chen po
33a7(yum): de'i gos sngon pas bkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de'i yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po dgos ser bas
33a8(yum): bkris te cheb kyi nang du stsal na/ cha ba de yang de 'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos dkar pos dkris te chub kyi nang du
33a9(yum): ma 'i me gas pa mas dpas kyi rang du sbal ma tshab de yang ro'i rang du
33b1(yum): sbrul na cha ba de yang de'i rang bzhin cad du 'gyur ro// gal rtenar bu rin pa che chen po dag stsal blunan gyis bu ris te rlung kyi nang dustsas na/ bdu
33b2(yum): de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de shel gyi kha dog gis gos kyis bkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ cha ba de yang
