33b3(yum): rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// de dag dang gos gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nor bu rin po che chen po de bkris te/ chab kyi nang du sA la na chub de yang de
33b4(yum): rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// chab de la rnyog pa ma mchis pa yang nor bu rim po che chen po de dang sa ste/ bcom ldan 'das ner bu rin po che chen po de ni yon
33b5(yum): tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag dang / gzhan yang rnam pa mang po dag ldan no// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin
33b6(yum): po che chen po de swa dang 'dra bar yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste/ sdig pa thams cad bsel ba'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
33b7(yum): lha'i dbang po brgya byi na la 'dri skad ces so// ko'u shi kaji snyam du sems/ nor bu rin po che chen po de lha rdzas zhig yin nam/ 'on tam nor bu rin pa/
33b8(yum): che chen po de 'dzam bu'i gling gi marnams la yang yod do// brgya byin gyis spras pa/ btsun pa dga' bo nor bu rin po chen chen po de ni lha rdzas te/ btsun pa
34a1(yum): dga' 'dam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la nor bu rin po che chen po gang yod pa de dag ni rlung ning lnga/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de dag
34a2(yum): ni chetshe ning yangs/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi nor bu rin po rje chen po de dag ni m+b+ha rdzas wAr man lag de dag gis yongs su rdzogs par ma yin te/
34a3(yum): 'jam bu'i gling gi nor bu rin po che chen po de dag gis ni lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po'i grangs sam/ cha'am/ bgrang ba'am/ dpe' 'am/ rgyur yang
34a4(yum): zhi bar mi 'gro'o// de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ner bu rin po che chen po snod la la
34a5(yum): zhig ga nang du stsal ba las sred de nas phyung yang snod de ni nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan gyis yid du mche bar 'gyur te/ gzhan yang snod de la mos pa bskyed
34a6(yum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di gang na mchis pa de'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu ma dag gi lus sem sems kyi sdug pas
34a7(yum): dang gnod pa mi las gyur pa'am/ m+bi ma lags palas gyur pa thams cad kyang ma mchis par myur te/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin pa tsho chen gyi nas
34a8(yum): 'gyi ba ni shes rab kyi pa rol du phyin pa'i tshig gra dgas so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mi nas kyi tshig bladags so// bcom ldan 'das shes ras
34b1(yum): ba rol du tsun pa'i yon dan // tsa sbyi kyig padzad par 'gyis/ shes rab kyi ra tu rkyen tu ma na rgyangasas nasaso// da dag gags
34b2(yum): sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das gtan gyi pha rol tu pa'i yon tanan/ ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi bre/ 2
34b3(yum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad mi mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sdang ngo // brtsa
34b4(yum): ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad mi mchis so//
34b5(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lha ji snyed cig
34b6(yum): brjod par bgyi ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni mchod mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
34b7(yum): snod de/ bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni chang ma mtsha
34b8(yum): saM/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i yon tan lnga ji snyed cig
35a1(yum): brjod par bgyi ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni mtshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol
35a2(yum): byin pa'i skyed de/ bcom ldan 'das na sring po tha~Md kyi yon tan ji skyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ nang srong ba'id kyi yon tan chang ma mchis so// de banon pashegs pa
35a3(yum): sku gdung de dag kyang nang song pa nyid kyi snong ngo // bcom ldan 'das phyi stong ba nyid kyi yon tanag/ ji snyed cig brjod par bgyiste/ bruM spong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis
35a4(yum): so/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang phyi stong pa nyid kyi snong ngo // bcom ldan 'das byi nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lnga ji snyed cig 'dzud par bgyi se/ phyin
35a5(yum): banyid kyi yon tan ni mchad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig
35a6(yum): brjed par 'gyiste/ slong pa nyid song ba nyid kyi yon nan chad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnyed pa byung sa cing song panyid kyi snyed de// bcom ldan
35a7(yum): 'das chen pa snang ba nyid kyi yon na lta snyed cig brjod par bgyiste/ chen po song ba zhid kyi yon tan cad pa marjes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de ga kyang kyi/
35a8(yum): bsang pashing kyi stong // bcom ldan 'das da da ma pasung pa nyid kyi yon ma ma ji byed cig brjod par bgyis/ ngad dam pa song khyi mni na ni cha ma mtsha
35b1(yum): dra nan gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag don pa stong pacad kyi snang do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas song pa nyid kyi yon d+ha sbyang sri cig brjod bar bgyi ste/ 'dus bya/
35b2(yum): stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni ched ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa
35b3(yum): kyi yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'dus ma byas stong
35b4(yum): pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad
35b5(yum): ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa skyong ba nyid kyi yon tan lta
35b6(yum): lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa
35b7(yum): stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong ba nyid kyi yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//
35b8(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang der ba med pasong pa nyid kyi snod // bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa yid kyi yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi se/ 8
36a1(yum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yon tan chad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan
36a2(yum): 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yon tan chad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
36a3(yum): de dag kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid /
36a4(yum): pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa
36a5(yum): spong ba da kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yon dan ni cha ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
36a6(yum): dedag kyang mi dmigs pa song pa nyid kyi srid de// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stod pa nid kyi yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dngos po mo
36a7(yum): bstong pas nyid kyi yon tan ni tshang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi sbed de// bcom ldan
36a8(yum): 'das ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid kyi yon tan lnga ji srid cig brjod par bgyis/ ji bozhidi song ba nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa
36b1(yum): sku gdu shA k+Sha ba po dang da kyisnod // bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa nang ma sa yo sprus tu skye
36b2(yum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dngos po med pa'i rdo rje 'ad song
36b3(yum): snod do// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi'i yon tan lha ji skad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi yon tan ni chud ma
36b4(yum): mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i yon
36b5(yum): tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang yang
36b6(yum): dag par spong ba rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i yon tan gyis lha ji snyed cig brjod bAgyi ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
36b7(yum): kye yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi sdod do// bcom ldan 'das dbang po lnga'i yon
36b8(yum): tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dbang po rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dbang po rnams kyi
37a1(yum): sna dang/ bcom ldan 'das stobs lnga'i yon tan/ ji snyed cig brjod par bzlas/ sobs rnams kyi yon tan ni chud snga mchis so//
37a2(yum): bzhin gshegs pa'i bug dung dengs kyang stobs rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi san na m+b+ha srid cig brjod par
37a3(yum): / byang chub kyi ma yan lag rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi snod de
37a4(yum): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang ba'i yon ngan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang ba'i yon tan ni chingam
37a5(yum): mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i sdod do// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i chen
37a6(yum): nas ji snyed cig brjod par bgyiste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'phags
37a7(yum): bar badzin pa rnams kyi snyed de// bcom ldan 'das pas pagatan rnams kyi na AHji skyed cig brjod par bgyi sa/ bsam go na rnams kyi men lda
37a8(yum): mamachis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phra ga dung de dag kyang bsamagatan rnams kyi seM 'o// bcom ldan 'das chang med pa pazhi'i man dan mjim
37b1(yum): brjod par bgyis// chud med pa rnams kyi man dran na chad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chad med pa rnams kyi spyod du/
37b2(yum): 'das gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa bzhi'i yon tan la ci snyed cig brjod par bgyi sa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ba ni'i yon tan na chu /
37b3(yum): mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi
37b4(yum): yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam par
37b5(yum): thar pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mthar gyi
37b6(yum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
37b7(yum): 'jug pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i skyo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod
37b8(yum): bgyi ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kya
38a1(yum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon na
38a2(yum): lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan ni chud ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mngon par shes parna
38a3(yum): kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das de ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan lnga ci snyed cig brjod par gyi ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin
38a4(yum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon dan sa ci snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ gzungs
38a5(yum): kyai sgo rnams kyi yon dan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gzhugs
38a6(yum): ba'i stobs bcu'i yon tan lnga ci snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i yon tan ni mtshan ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
38a7(yum): gdung de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa bani'i yon tan lnga ci snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mi 'jigs pa rnam/
38a8(yum): kyiyon tan ni tsha ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das sas yang dag par rig par rnaMm
38b1(yum): mnadun na kyi med nig brjed par gyi sa/ mas yang dag par ga pa rnams kyidon tanan chu ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sdug dung medag grangs smras /
38b2(yum): par rig pa rnams kyi snod de// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po'i man tan la ci snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ snying rje chen po'i yon tan ni tshang ma mchis so//
38b3(yum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang snying rje chen po'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi yon tan lha ci snyed cig brjod par bgyi
38b4(yum): ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo
38b5(yum): brgyad kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ci snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de/
38b6(yum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang thams cad shes pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lnga ci snyed cig brjod par bgyi
38b7(yum): ste/ lam rnam par shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'a/
38b8(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ci snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs
39a1(yum): pa'i sa gdung de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snod de// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin med kyi yon tan la ci sred sdig brjod par bya
39a2(yum): de bzhin thaMd kyi yon tan ni tsha ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang de bzhin nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das ma nor bde bzhin nying kyi yon tan
39a3(yum): ci sbed pa cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ma nor 'di bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni mtshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdud de dag kyang ma ner ba de bzhin nyid kyi
39a4(yum): do/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lnga ni sred ci brjod par bgyi ste/ gzhan ma yin pade bzhin nyid kyi yon tanan tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin
39a5(yum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung dag kyang gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid kyi yon tan lnga ci snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos
39a6(yum): nyid kyi yon tan rten tshod ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdud de dag kyang chos ny-id kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi sbyin+ta dan
39a7(yum): ji skyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yon tan ni tshang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan sku gadrung de dag kyang ches kyi stong nga/
39a8(yum): bam ldan lam tshas kyi gnas pa'i gyi mni na ma ma cig brjo pa brgyab/ chos kyi gnas nyi kyi yon tan ma tshad mamachis so// de bzhin gshegs
39b1(yum): sgru bdung dru dgakyang chos kyi gnas pa nyid kyi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das chos mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon ngan sa ni sbed ci brjod par bcab/ rlos rgyu du /
39b2(yum): yon tan ni tshad mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon nas ci ste
39b3(yum): brjod par bgyi ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon tan ni chad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang yang dag pa'i ma'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das pa
39b4(yum): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan lta ci snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/
39b5(yum): gdung de dag kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i yon tan lda
39b6(yum): snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i yon ton ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
39b7(yum): de dag kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i yon tan lnga ci skad cig
39b8(yum): brjod par bgyi sde/ rtag tu'ang sems la gnas pa'i yon tan ni tshang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag rtag rngu 'dang snyoms la gnas pa'i
40a1(yum): bcom ldan 'das mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid yon tan la ci snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ma mnyam pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan ni chung ma mchis so//
40a2(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi ma'am pa'i chos nyid kyi snod de// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod nga mnga'o// bcom ldan
40a3(yum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol du phyin pa rin po che'i snod do// de bas na de gzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mang ro//
40a4(yum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba mi mchis pa'i snod do// de bas na de banin
40a5(yum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa mi sno ma 'gag pa'i sdong /
40a6(yum): bsan de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung ni mtshod mang // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i skubardung de dag ni pha rol du byin pa b+h+ring bram mchis padang /
40a7(yum): kham mchis pa'i snong // de bsan de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gadrung de dgra ni mdzod pa mdza'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i skug dung de dag ni
40a8(yum): rol tu phyin pa 'bri ba dang ldan 'am mchis pa'i sdod do// de zas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sdug dung de dag ni mchongad pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin pa 'i/
40b1(yum): nga'i gru ba dung de dag ni darnal du phyin pa 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang / gnas pam mchis pa'i spod de// de bas na de ba'i na gshegs pa'i rdzun dung dadag tung mchod pa mdan/
40b2(yum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid kyi snod do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang pha rol du phyinapa
40b3(yum): chos nyid kyis yongs su bsgoms pa'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mchod pa mnga'o//
40b4(yum): gzhan yang steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur yongs su lham pa lta zhog gi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te
40b5(yum): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung bye ma snyed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur lham pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gleg
40b6(yum): khadu bris pa zhig stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid len to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
40b7(yum): 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung rnams de mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
40b8(yum): rol du phyin pa yongs su bsgoms pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag mchod pa mnga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin
41a1(yum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la rim gror bgyid pa dang / bkur srir bgyid pa dang / bu dud du bgying ba dang / mchong bar bgyid pa yang
41a2(yum): dge ba'i rgyu ba de'i mtha' mi dmigs shing / rgyal rigs che ning mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs rje ni mtho ba'am// khyim bdag gi rigs che ni mtho ba 'am/ rgya
41a3(yum): chen pa ni rigs kyi lha 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'am/ mtshe ma'i lha 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lba'am/ 'phrul dga'i lha 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kye lha'i rma
41a4(yum): du mi dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba myong nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sdug bsngal gyi mthar dbyung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mtshong mchod pa'i
41a5(yum): 'bras bu ni de tsam du gyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni bzung zhing bcangs pa dang / grags shing kun chub par bgyis pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis na
41a6(yum): ting nge 'dzin gyi ba rom tu zin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi ba la du zin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bzong ba'i rol byin pa
41a7(yum): brdzogs par gyur ro// rdul khribs kyi sa sa bu na pa ma ngas sa rdzogs par 'gyur ro// smon pa bar 'i tu byin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyu / na sa
41a8(yum): maci yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyi song banyid yongs su rdzoms phra bar 'gyur ro// rkyen ngo gang pazhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// song ba nyid stong nga/
41b1(yum): mangs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// don dam pa spong bzhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// 'dus ma byas zang ba nyin
41b2(yum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa zhid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong ba nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
41b3(yum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzo/
41b4(yum): par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa sma
41b5(yum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dngos
41b6(yum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yod
41b7(yum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs
41b8(yum): par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
42a1(yum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bani yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshad med pa bzhi mangs
42a2(yum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshad med pa pa ni yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa pa ni yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rnam pa
42a3(yum): ngar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo snang ba'in
42a4(yum): banyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnam
42a5(yum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgonam skye su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yos su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/
42a6(yum): mi 'jigs pa bani yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sa sa meng dag par rig pa'i'i yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// snre 'i chen po yongs su rdzogs par gyur
42a7(yum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i cheng du ba sems te lus yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// lus de dag gis sa
42a8(yum): na mongs su son par byed par 'gyur // ba mos byung ba'i sras sapa/ rgyal rigs chen mtho'am/ thamapa jig kyi kyi nang ma 'a'am khyim /
42b1(yum): lags chen dmam par skyes pa'i sras sam/ brgya ny-i gyis sa zugs pas/ rgyangs pa'i gzugs sam/ dasabs zlan gzugs nga rung ste/ lus na dzad du/
42b2(yum): can mongs su sbyin par bgyid par 'gyur ro// can thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das so/ byang chub sems depa'i phrin med par 'jun pa
42b3(yum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob nas
42b4(yum): sangs rgyas kyi ning nas sangs rgyas kyi ning du mchis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gro ma mchis pa
42b5(yum): ma lags/ glo ba ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ mchod par mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lags/ gzung bar mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
42b6(yum): pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dung dang / mchod pa bgyis na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
42b7(yum): rgyu shin du brtsegs pa lags sa/ bun gsum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la'ang rim gro dang /
42b8(yum): bkur sI dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chad dang / grangs
43a1(yum): mamachis pa sa na/ btsun gzhugs pa dag tsam pa la dag par rdzogs panas sgyus byu byung bdang /
43a2(yum): san pa de ga ltar chos kyi skud dag zugs kyi su dang le zhes kyi skur mab bar 'tshal ning / mchid par 'tshal bas shes rab kyi phyin pa 'do bzung bar
43a3(yum): bcang bar bgyi/ klag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par srun par bgyi/ rdul khrims bzhin du'ang yi la bgyi'o/
43a4(yum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu ma des ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
43a5(yum): rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des chos nyid du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o//
43a6(yum): bcom ldan 'das ga'i na yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag ma 'angs pa na mthong bar 'cha
43a7(yum): bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'azung bar brtse/ brkyang bar bgyi/ zag par brtsi/ klan chub par bgyi/ mnod par bgyi/ gzhan dgal yang rgya cher yang nga
43a8(yum): par bsan par bgyi/ chos ni tshul bzhin du'ang yid la bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis pa 'di dag ni chos nyid de/ gnyis gang zhen/ 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi cho
43b1(yum): dang / 'arnas ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos dang // bcom ldan 'das del 'dus byas kyi chos rnams bya rgyas ci ga du lags byed/ nang song pa byam bsdu /
43b2(yum): song banyid kyil zhes dang / blanang spong bzed kyi le shes dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mi shes dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye zhes dang / den dam pa spong pa cid kyimi na sa hU~M/
43b3(yum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa spong pa nyid kyi yis
43b4(yum): dang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes da/
43b5(yum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ky-i ye shes dang / dranapa
43b6(yum): nye bar gnag pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / dbang po lnga'i ye shes dang / stobs lnga'i ye shes
43b7(yum): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / bsam gtan pa ni/
43b8(yum): ye shes dang / tshad med pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ye shes dang / mthar gyis gnas
44a1(yum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa'i spyod pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i ye shes dang / mngo/
44a2(yum): par shes lnga'i ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dang / gzungs kyi sgra thams cad kyi ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ye shes dang / mi 'a
44a3(yum): bya bzhi'i ye shes dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / snying rje chen po'i ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ye shes dang / dge ba'i
44a4(yum): chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang /
44a5(yum): 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye zhes gang lags pa de ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi/
44a6(yum): de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nying gang lags shes na// de ni gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa dang /
44a7(yum): rnanas pa sa kun du byung ba sa rlung / sa pa dang / rnam par byung bam mas pa dang / 'dil bas skyes smras/ di
44a8(yum): chos thams ca byeng banyid do/ chos thams cad rje zo gang mags zhen/ chos thams cad ni ngam po mang pa dzi nyid de/ 'dzin 'dus mi rkyos kyichis rnams kyi
44b1(yum): // na 'dus kyis pa/ 'phrul ldan no// da na/ sa kyi ban ga
44b2(yum): bar rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji skad cig byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyis chem du phyin pa'i mi la rkyen nas/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i drung du du rje/
44b3(yum): bar sangs rgyas so// ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang de snyed cig 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyi
44b4(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la rten cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de ltar byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i
44b5(yum): 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ci snyed cig bzhugs ni shing 'tshe srung ba
44b6(yum): dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la rten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//
44b7(yum): 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang sbed cig byang chub dang ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs
44b8(yum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag/
45a1(yum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ci snyed jig yod pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la
45a2(yum): rten te rgyun tu zhugs 'bras bu thob po// thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras buthong bo// thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'a
45a3(yum): buthob bo// thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// thob pa// thob par 'gyur ro/ 'das pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji sri cig byung ba dang
45a4(yum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med dgrangs med pa dag ni rang sangs rgyas gling rje snyed/
45a5(yum): cig 'khod cing / 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la rten te/ rang byang chub thob bo// thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir
45a6(yum): na 'di la zhes rabakyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dams theg pa gsung po rnangs ca na sbyin te/ de dag kyang mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / dmigs pa'i dum
45a7(yum): skye ba med pa'i tshul dang / 'gag po med pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs du med pa'i rdul dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang / mngon par 'dum med
45a8(yum): tshul dang / len pa med pa'i tshul dang / 'dor ba med pa'i tshul dang / 'bri ba med pa'i tshul dang / bstan pa meng pa'i tshul dang / blang ba med pa'i tshul dang/
45b1(yum): snang ba med pa'i dul dang / snang bamed pa'i drub tshul bstan te/ dem 'das can gyi brgyad ce tshul gyis bskrun gyi na dam pa nim yin no// datso ra
45b2(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ring du song ba ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni tshu rol du ma yin/ pha rol ma yin/ thad du 'dug pa ma yin/
45b3(yum): 'dug pa ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin/ mi mnyam pa ma yin/ mtshan ma ma yin/ mtshan ma med pa ma yin/ 'jig rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa rmi/
45b4(yum): yin/ 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ mi dge ba ma yin/ 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ ko'u
45b5(yum): ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rgyud du zhugs pa'i chos rnams
45b6(yum): nyed bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu
45b7(yum): byin pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ko'u shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ko'u shI ka nas
45b8(yum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrib pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol
46a1(yum): pasang zug rgyu dus 'ag pa/ / @ sa
46a2(yum): kyis phyin pa 'an pa sa du na pa sa ste/ spyan dus byang chu ba sgoms dpa sas smra dun pa zhes na na
46a3(yum): rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang skyed pa ltal ni/ sems can du myigs pas mchis pa// sems can drug shes par dogashes pam ma na
46a4(yum): 'dug tu ma dmigs pa ma mchis so// sems can du dmigs pa ma mchis so// srog du dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'gro bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// gso bar
46a5(yum): dmyigs pam mchis so// skyes bur dmigs pa ma mchis so// gang zag drung dmigs pa ma mchis so// sheng can du dmigs pa ma mchis so// shed byungs
46a6(yum): dmyigs pa ma mchis so// byeng pa po dang migs pa ma mchis so// tshong pa 'i'i dmigs pam mchis so// zhes pa zer dmigs pa ma mchis sa// mthong ba
46a7(yum): shes pa ma rnas sa// nag sa srung gsupas mtshams/ ltung bad me sa dbyigs pasas nus pa/ 'gres sung rigs parnarnams// 'du
46a8(yum): dung rigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par shes par darigs pam mchis so// tshig dung migs pam mchis so// rna bar rdzogs pa ma mchis so// sna gas
46b1(yum): mas lce dugs ma mas// las krung sa rnam mtshamapa// nga du gas mas/
46b2(yum): dmags pa ma mchis so// dri dmigs pam mchis so// de rigs pa ma mtshas so// reg du rigs panas ches so// chos su dmigs sum
46b3(yum): mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// sna'i rnam par shes pa dmigs pa ma mchis so//
46b4(yum): rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus kyi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// yid kyi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// mig gi
46b5(yum): 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dmigs par ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus de reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// lce'i
46b6(yum): 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus de reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// mig
46b7(yum): gi 'dus de reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba dmigs pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
46b8(yum): kyis che bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyed gyis tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus kyis 'jus pa reg pa'i rkyen gyis chor
47a1(yum): dmigs pa ma mchis so// yid kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs par ma mchis so// sa'i khams su dmigs pa mchi
47a2(yum): so/ chu'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// me'i khams su dmigs pa'i tshul ma mchis so// rlung gi khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' 'a
47a3(yum): sru dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// ma rig par dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'du byed du dmigs pa ma ma
47a4(yum): so/ rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// ming dang gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so// skye mched drug du dmigs pa ma mchis so// reg par dmig
47a5(yum): ba ma mchis so// tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// sred par dmigs pa ma mchis so// len par dmigs pa ma mchis so// srid par dmigs pa ma mtsha
47a6(yum): so/ skye bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// rga ni dmigs pa ma mchis so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// rdul khrims kyi pha rol du/
47a7(yum): byin pa dmigs par ma mchis so// bzong ba'i pha rol tu phyin par dardzogs par ma mchis so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa migs pa ma mchis sa/
47a8(yum): rnamams ma ma mas na shes pa kyi ma du phyin pa pa migs tshas 'o// tha~Mng shing du rigs mas
47b1(yum): nga da nga mas na // rlung du rnams pam na// ngas
47b2(yum): pom mchis so// don nam pastong pa nyid du dmogs pa ma mchis so// 'dus byas skor bcing dru dmigs pa sam chis so// 'dus su byas 'a ba ni du
47b3(yum): ma mchis so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dor ba med pa stong pa
47b4(yum): nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rang gi mtshan
47b5(yum): nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//
47b6(yum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs ma mchis so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su dmi
47b7(yum): pa ma mchis so// yang dag par spong ba rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// dbang po rnams su
47b8(yum): dmigs pa ma mchis so// stobs rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// byang chub kyi yan laganas su dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'phags lham yin la
48a1(yum): brgyad par dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// bsam gtan rnams sum
48a2(yum): dmigs su pa ma mchis so// tshad med pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par thar pa
48a3(yum): brgyad du dmigs pa ma mchis so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
48a4(yum): ma med pa dang smon pa med par dmigs pa ma mchis so// mngon par shes pa rnamasu dmigs pa ma mchis so// ting nge 'dzin rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis
48a5(yum): so/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// mi 'jigs pa rnams su
48a6(yum): dmigs pa ma mchis so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// snying rje chen por dmigs pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas
48a7(yum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rgyun tu nugs pa'i 'bras bur dmigs dam mchis so// lan cig khyer 'ong ba'i 'brag bur ngam /
48a8(yum): bam mchis pa// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs pa mamachims// dam bcom pa nyid rdung migs pas mchis so// rang byang chub drung migs pa
48b1(yum): mtsham sa lam gyi rnam par shes panyid du du migs pa ma mchis so// rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa rjid drung migs pa sa mtshas so// sangs rnas su
48b2(yum): ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos su dmigs pa ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa'i tshul dunye par gnas bcu lags so//
48b3(yum): slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis dmigs par 'gyur ba dang / gang la dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang du dmigs par bgyi bde lta bu'i ngo bo nyid de ma mchis
48b4(yum): so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des mi dmigs pa'i tshul
48b5(yum): du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yun ring por spyad pas des byang chub kyang mi dmigs na/ sangs rgyas lta ci smos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos lnga'adi smos/ brgya
48b6(yum): byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gyi de ma lags pa'i pha rol tu
48b7(yum): phyin pa gzhan la mi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po kun
48b8(yum): la yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod de/ des sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ gtong ba'ang mi dmigs/ len pa'ang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs
49a1(yum): tshul khrims dung ldan pa yang mi dmigs/ rdul khrims ngan pa yang mi dmigs// brjod du yang med dmigs/ dazod ba dang ldan pa la/
49a2(yum): mi dmigs/ gnod sems kyang mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs/ le lo yang mi dmig so// bsam
49a3(yum): gtan yang mi dmigs/ bsam gtan dang ldan pa yang me dmigs so// g.yeng ba yang mi dmigs so// shes rab kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab dang ldan pa ya
49a4(yum): me dmigs/ shes rab 'tshal pa yang mi dmigs so// ko'u shi ka 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba mi dmigs
49a5(yum): pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang // mig mi dmigs pa ni
49a6(yum): rdul dang / rnab mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lde mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus mye dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid ni dkrigs pan+d+ha/
49a7(yum): tshul dang 'dregs sang migs pa'i bral dang sgyum dpags pa'i rgyum / rigs pa'i rdzu dang / rim ma / rim ming
49a8(yum): rnam pa pa rna ma'i shes seM segs pa'i dus dang / dzi'i rnam pa gis pa thaMng mim pa'i rdzam sa pa
49b1(yum): par masna pa me krigs pa'i tshul dang / lha rnam par shes pami migs pa'i tshul dang / lhas kyi rnam par shes pa med dmigs pa'i tshul dang / byu
49b2(yum): pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna 'dus de reg pa mi dmigs/
49b3(yum): tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi myigs pa'i tshul du
49b4(yum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba las mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sde'o
49b5(yum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
49b6(yum): las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
49b7(yum): chu'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / me'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs pa'i
49b8(yum): tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed ma dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes mi dmigs
50a1(yum): pa'i tshul dang / mid dang gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye marnyed drug mi darigs pa'i rdul dang / reg pa mi dmigs pa'i rdul dang /
50a2(yum): tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phred pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / len pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sring ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye ba mi dmigs
50a3(yum): tshub dang / rgas me dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i ba rol tu phyin gyi dmigs pa'i rdul dang / rdul khrims kyi rol du phrin pa ma dmigs pa'i tshu'adug
50a4(yum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / btsun 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bras ma gtong rje pha rol du phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i
50a5(yum): rdul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa me dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rlung stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i rdul dang / byi skyong ba nyid med rigs pa'i tshul dang / b+hin
50a6(yum): spang ba zhing mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid song ba nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi dmigs pa'i rdul dang / don ngem pasnyed panying
50a7(yum): dmas pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas spong banyid me migs pa'i rdul dang // mdzad las 'das pa sbeng pa pying sri dmi gas pa'i tshul dang / thos ma dang ma pa mchi/
50a8(yum): bsong banyid mo dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang ba med pa thong 'ji mi migs pa'i rdus dang / rang bzhin sang ba cing med migs pa'i tshul dang / chos
50a9(yum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang
50b1(yum): byung ba ma migs pa'i rgyal dang / rang mtshan cad gang tud mang rigs pa'i chu dang / mi dmigs pa sang gyu du sangasasmras pa skye / na
50b2(yum): med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dran pa
50b3(yum): nye bar gzhag pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dbang po lnga ni
50b4(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stobs lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi
50b5(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chang med pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i
50b6(yum): tshul dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i sgom
50b7(yum): bar 'jug dgu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa lnga maM/
50b8(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs kyi sgo thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stob
51a1(yum): bcu ni dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang
51a2(yum): snying rje chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo bcung mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul
51a3(yum): dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dmigs pa'i tshul dang
51a4(yum): rang byang chub kyi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa myi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos
51a5(yum): thams cad mi dgas pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya
51a6(yum): sngon gyi du 'gro ba'o// zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kya tshal yongs su srung ba'o// tshul khrim
51a7(yum): kyi be rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bye bo la sngon du 'i gro ba'o// zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa bzod pa
51a8(yum): yongs su slob pa'i bzod pa'i ba rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gre 'o'o// zhes rab kyi pa rol du phyin pan byang chub sems dpa
51b1(yum): dbang chen po brtson 'grus yongs su rlom pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// skyes rab kyi ro tu phyi
51b2(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems chen po bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du
51b3(yum): bo'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la rnam par lta ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba
51b4(yum): la sngon du 'gro ba'o// ko'u shi ka 'di l-I ste dper na/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi shing rnams la ma sna tshogs can/ me tog sna tshogs can/ 'bras bu sna tshogs can/ dpyin
51b5(yum): sna tshogs can/ chu zheng sna tshogs can du 'khod kyang / de dag gi grib ma la khyad par ram bye brag mi dmigs te/ gzhan du na grib ma gri bram zhes bya ba'i grangs su
51b6(yum): 'gro bar zad do// ko'u shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa thams cad mkhye mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su sngos te/
51b7(yum): rnams la yang khyad par ram bye brag mi dmigs so// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu bla ni yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
51b8(yum): bgyi ba'i slad du yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan
52a1(yum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'dus shes rab N+DI ba rol du mun pa ni smon sum mchis bdang ldan pa'i yang dus rlo kun du mtha' mas padang ra ro//

52a3(yum): phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdur dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/

53a1(yum): nA de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyis gdul pa'i sems can mchis pa rnams kyis dadu gragrus chen po skye na/ de ba na gnags pa'i drung dru

53b2(yum): shi ka 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid son pa yin te/ smon pa ni gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/

58b4(yum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shau ka zag pa
58b5(yum): med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du byin pa
58b6(yum): dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsom gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / byo slong
58b7(yum): nyi dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
58b8(yum): ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid nga/
59a1(yum): chos thams cad snang ba nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa spong pa sgostod dang / dngos po med pa stong panyid dang /
59a2(yum): ngo bo nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gnag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
59a3(yum): ba ni dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'jigs pa'i bden pa
59a4(yum): ba'i dang / bsam gtan bani dang / tshad med pa ban dang / gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar rgya
59a5(yum): gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo brjid dang / mtsha ma med pa dang ston pa med pa med/ mngon par zhes pa rnam/
59a6(yum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgra thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag pa
59a7(yum): rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms
59a8(yum): chen po dag so// sangs rgyas kyi chos chad med pa gnan dag kyang rgyabastan to// ko'u gis rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang sa las shes
59b1(yum): rab tu pa sa dutsun pa 'ad myigs pam du byas pa/ ga pa dang / zeb dang // 'ang byab byer ba nas sbyin dbas sa sasu
59b2(yum): par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan to// de dag yod pas rgyal rigs tshe ring mtho ba rnams
59b3(yum): yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu
59b4(yum): rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// rdzi ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha
59b5(yum): rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lnga nye ban gyi lha rnams yod do// chungs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi
59b6(yum): rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun sdung dang ba'i lha rnams yod do
59b7(yum): dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod de// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod ngo //
59b8(yum): chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams
60a1(yum): yod / shin du mtho ba la rnams mad// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams mdzang // 'og man gyi rnams med// nam ma kha ma
60a2(yum): yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med
60a3(yum): 'du shes med men skye mched kyi lha rnams yod de// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod de// rgyul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod de// bzod pa'i
60a4(yum): pha rol du phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
60a5(yum): yod/ nang sring pa nying yod do// dri slong pa nod yod / rgyunang sring pa zhi 'a // snang banyid song pa zhing med de// ma
60a6(yum): stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pastong ba nyid yod do// 'dus byas snang pa nyid mdado// 'dus ma byas srung ba zhid mad de// mthar
60a7(yum): las 'das pa spyong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa spong ba da no// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du/ rang bzhin stong banyid yod do// chos rnams
60a8(yum): sa'am sa da mi /
60b1(yum): sa da pa ya / rdzun pa sa ldan / smra
60b2(yum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// skabs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med do/
60b3(yum): phyi ri lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod de// bsam gtan rnams yod do// rlung meng pa
60b4(yum): yod de/ gzugaso med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'i
60b5(yum): pa dgur yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes par shes pa rnams
60b6(yum): yod do/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ mi 'jigs pa
60b7(yum): rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ byams pa chen po yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
60b8(yum): rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yo
61a1(yum): rkang byang chub med du/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yod de// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidad// rgyun du ga
61a2(yum): bu rnams yod do// lan cig byer 'ong ba rnams yod de// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams med do// rang sangs rgyas rnams
61a3(yum): yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams med do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams meng /
61a4(yum): ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka gleng bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la/
61a5(yum): las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji sem du sems/ rigs kyi du'am rigs kyi bu mde'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lo/ gso
61a6(yum): babacom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi kade bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu ma ga dgis/
61a7(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gnan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//
61a8(yum): de ci'i tshe'i phyir zhe na/ so'u shig de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bsan te/ de dag la bas
61b1(yum): ngarigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi mdag yang dag pa'i spyan med par nA gA swA pAR+Sha b+hA // 'dug / la par byug+hu ro// rgyu
61b2(yum): 'bras bu thob bo par gyur to/ thob po/ thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te/ tho ze// dza'i por gyur na/
61b3(yum): phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro/ dgra bcom pa nyid theb par gyur te/ thob pa/ thob par 'gyur ro// rangasu
61b4(yum): rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub sa thob par gyur to// thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sem/
61b5(yum): dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ba ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon
61b6(yum): par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang
61b7(yum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab
61b8(yum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang don depa stong po zhing dang / 'dus byas stong
62a1(yum): smra
62a2(yum): stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyi dang rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan 'ang stong
62a3(yum): nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo 'dzi
62a4(yum): pazhing stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bani dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / da
62a5(yum): po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden
62a6(yum): pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan ban dang / chang med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnams
62a7(yum): ra babyung dang / mar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gra nga / rnam par mjogasang pa nid dang / mtshatsham med
62a8(yum): sgo pa med pa dang / mngo par shes padrug dang / ting ngol thams sa dang / zugs kyi sa thams cad dang / nge
62b1(yum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa ba'i dang / sa so yang dag par ga pa bani dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dzes pa
62b2(yum): brkyang dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' bachen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgya
62b3(yum): chos tshad med pa gzhan dag par kyang rgya cher stan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs nges kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes
62b4(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glags bam du bris shing klag pa dang / ze ba dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhanal byin na/ de bas 'dzi
62b5(yum): bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
62b6(yum): las chos thams cad rgya cher snyan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs chen zhing mtho brnam
62b7(yum): yod do/ khyim ba ga gi sma che zhing mtho ba rnams yod ngo // rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod ngo / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lnga
62b8(yum): rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan
63a1(yum): 'phrulang dang byed kyi lamams ma / nangs ris kyil rnams yadzang // rnangs ldan par gyi rnam
63a2(yum): yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyis lnga rnams yod do// sdang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chu sdang gi lha rnams
63a3(yum): yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun sdang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// rlung dge'i lham
63a4(yum): yod do// tshad med dge tshang med dge ba'i ldarnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// rlung che'i lta
63a5(yum): rnams yod do// tshang med rtse ba'i lharnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lharnams yod do// mche ba'i lharnams yod do// mi gdung
63a6(yum): lha rnams yod // ma du mthong ba'i la rnams mdzad // gya nom spang ba'i lha rnams me / 'og man gyi lnga rnams yod ngo // rnam
63a7(yum): thams skye mched kyi lharnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' las skye ma med kyi lharnams yongs pa/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi ldam
63a8(yum): yod do/ 'du shes med 'du shes med mchi skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha
63b1(yum): la duldan pa mang // mtshang ba'ab ma tu phyin pa mang// btsun 'grus kya la tu phyin pa ma dang // bsam gtan can
63b2(yum): tu phyi pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong ngo // nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi slong ba nyid yod ngo // phyi nang sa ba
63b3(yum): nying yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// dor dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong
63b4(yum): nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// tho ga ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do//
63b5(yum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong
63b6(yum): yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos
63b7(yum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// ngan pa zhi bar bzhan pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yong ngo // rdzu 'phru
63b8(yum): rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i
64a1(yum): lam yan lag bgying pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam tan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams
64a2(yum): yo // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yong ngo // rnam par thar pa brgyad nga yong ngo // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug padan
64a3(yum): yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtsha ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge la chi rnams mang
64a4(yum): gzugs kyi sgo rnams yod ngo do// de ba zhi gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mad
64a5(yum): byams pa chen po yongs do/ snying rje chen po yod do// bya sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mdango // chun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do//
64a6(yum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod ngo // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mdzod// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi
64a7(yum): byashes pa nyid yong ngo // rnam pa tham cad mkhyen pa zhing yod ngo do// rgyun du nags pa rnams yongad do// len cis bya'i 'ong ba rnams med do// phyi
64a8(yum): 'ang brnams med do// dgra ba comad rnams meng // rang sangs rgyas rnams ming // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/
64b1(yum): batshan gshegs pa ma bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yang du// lo tsaM ka kAng chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
64b2(yum): can rnams lnga zhog go/ ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten khams byung bu'i sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu mo la las dge bcu'i las kyi
64b3(yum): larab tu bkongad na/ ko'u shi ka de ci'i skam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa
64b4(yum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs
64b5(yum): kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang bri ba dang kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du
64b6(yum): 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya che
64b7(yum): bstan te/ de dag la srabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mod ga yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur
64b8(yum): // rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// thob po thob par 'gyur to// lan cis phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu tho par gyur to// phyir mi nga
65a1(yum): dazas pa gyu // rgyu // klu shAbardza gyu/
65a2(yum): rang sangs kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par 'gyur to// thob po thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
65a3(yum): kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
65a4(yum): nub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau
65a5(yum): ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di la ste sbyor bar pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khom gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i phyir
65a6(yum): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grub kyi pha rol tu phyin bang / bsam du phyin 'ang shes rab kye pha rol tu phyin pa / nang song ba 'i dang
65a7(yum): bzhing dang / phyinang spyong pa nying dang / stong pa zhing dang stong pa nying dang / chen po stong ba nyid dang / ngorang rdzo pa song ba nyid dang / 'das byas snang ba'i
65a8(yum): sa 'dus ma byas sred pa ring dang mtha' las 'angs pa spong bcing dang / thig ma ma med pa song ba zhing dang dzar ba med pa sring
65b1(yum): ban myong ba dang / chos thams cad srung ba 'i dang / rang gi myu nan me spyod pa zhing dang / mang migs pa stong pa ni dang /
65b2(yum): med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag
65b3(yum): par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzung 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
65b4(yum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyom
65b5(yum): bar 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
65b6(yum): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzugs kyi sgo thams cad
65b7(yum): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
65b8(yum): bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / ngaga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi
66a1(yum): mang med pa na dag kyang rgyu mar bskur ro// koSh+Na ni karnam grangs nges na gas kyi bu'am rigs
66a2(yum): mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/
66a3(yum): sa 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
66a4(yum): 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ deng ga yod pas rgyal rigs che ba zhing 'tho ba rnams yod ngo // bram ze'i rigs che zhing mthong
66a5(yum): rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs re zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi
66a6(yum): lharnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi la rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gnan 'phrul
66a7(yum): dbang byed kyi lharnams yod ngo // rgyangs ris kyi lha rnams mdzod/ chang na par grol rnams yod ngo // tshangs pa kun 'khor gyil rnams
66a8(yum): yang / mangs chen gyil rnams yod do// sdang ba'i la rnams yong // chung srang ge lha rnams yo // mang med snang ba'i lha rnams
66b1(yum): kAn spang dang ba'i la rnams yo / dge ba'i lha rnams yod ngo // rlung dge'i lha rnams yang du// chang med nga ge ba la rnams yod/
66b2(yum): dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod ngo do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myong che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i la rnams yod do// 'bra
66b3(yum): zu ba lta rnams mngan/ mai che ba'i lharnams yod do// ga dung ba'i lha rnams ma na/ don du mchong pa'i marnams med /
66b4(yum): rnam snang ba'i ma rnams mdzad/ 'og min gyi lha rnams mang ngo // rnam ma kha mas skye mched kyil rnams yang ngo // rnam shes mtha'
66b5(yum): skye mched kyi lha rnams yod ngo do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi la rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyil rnams mang
66b6(yum): sbyar ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod ngo do// tshul khrims kyis pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus
66b7(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsamatan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// mang stong pa nyid yod do//
66b8(yum): byi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yong ngo // stong pa nying song ba nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yong/
67a1(yum): 'dus byas spyong pa yang yod do/ 'das ma byas stong ba zhid myong // mtha' las 'das paskyong ngan mad/
67a2(yum): ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid yong dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhir stong pa zhing yong ngo // thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan
67a3(yum): nyi spyong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong zhing yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nying stong pa nyid yong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo sa
67a4(yum): na stong pa nying yod do// ngan pazhi bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par baspong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// nga
67a5(yum): po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yong ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rnam brgyad pa yod do//
67a6(yum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yong ngo // tshang med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
67a7(yum): rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i ma song ba
67a8(yum): dang mtshan ma med pa dang / ston pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod // ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyis
67b1(yum): rnams yod du// debazhin gshegs pa gang+yas rnams mdang / smre 'dzags pa rnams mdang // masal dang gapar rigs pa rnams mad/
67b2(yum): byam chub cher za ma nga// snyi rjes rnyen po mad// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyang yang ngo // rgyun duzhugs pa'i 'dus dra
67b3(yum): / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa 'di yod ngo // rang byang chub yod ngo //
67b4(yum): gyi rnam par shes pa zhing yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yong
67b5(yum): do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yang ngo // gra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
67b6(yum): chen po rnams yod ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya rnams yod do//
67b7(yum): shes ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyad pa dum bu drug pa// / kham po rgya nyi shu rta rgyad pa//
67b8(yum): ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jog rten gyi khams byung bul zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gnyis pa bar me'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sem
68a1(yum): sa smras kyu las tshul na la
68a2(yum): na/ ko'u shi ka de ci snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i gsod rnams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa
68a3(yum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ko'u shi ka de bas na rig
68a4(yum): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di legs bam du bri ba dang / klag pa dang /
68a5(yum): kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na gsod nams ches mang du'aphel lo// ji ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka ngo ma di lta zhes rab kyi
68a6(yum): rol du phyin 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bsan te/ rang bal spobs shing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mang
68a7(yum): yang dag pa'i sgon med par zhugs par gyur te// 'dzun go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyu
68a8(yum): thob pa thob ra 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras zathob par gyur \u0f7f// thob 'i thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi
68b1(yum): kha'i 'bras pa dzub par gyur te// thob pa thob par 'gyur ro// nga za bcom pa zhing thob par gyur to// thong batho par 'gyur
68b2(yum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// thob thob par 'gyur ro// khyo chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i
68b3(yum): rnams kyang byang chub seM sa pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug par 'gyur ro// blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
68b4(yum): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'ju'atshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// koru shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos dengs kyang
68b5(yum): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sbyin pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol phyin pa dang / bzod ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtsom
68b6(yum): 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid
68b7(yum): dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang song ba nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa spong ba nyi
68b8(yum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas pa stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha mchis med pa
69a1(yum): song pa na dang / dang ba med pa song pa snying dang / rang ba ma spong bas dang / chos thams cad song pa
69a2(yum): nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos
69a3(yum): po med pa'ing bo nyid stong po nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhan pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba ba'i dang // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa na
69a4(yum): dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yang lag bdur dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rkyang pa dang / 'phags
69a5(yum): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i sdom par 'jug pa bzhi dang // rnam par
69a6(yum): thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par bzar pa'i sgo stong pa ning dang / mtshanam med
69a7(yum): dang / slong ba med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
69a8(yum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / mi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
69b1(yum): dang / rnams pa chen po dang / na pa dang / da' yin pa dang / bdang mas ldan 'ang sas/
69b2(yum): med pa bzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am shes kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol
69b3(yum): phyi pa glegs pas zos shing / klag pa dang / zi ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byi na/ de bas 'di bsod nams ches mang
69b4(yum): 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'e'u shi ka don 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher su
69b5(yum): to/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che 'di mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs mem
69b6(yum): mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// rlo mo'i lha rnams yod ngo //
69b7(yum): dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// rangs ris kyi lharnam
69b8(yum): yod do/ tshangs lha nye phar gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lA
70a1(yum): tshad med snang ba'i lha rma
70a2(yum): mdzan rlu dang mams gyurams mang// des rnarnams
70a3(yum): rlung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshang med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lharnams yod do// chung che'i
70a4(yum): rnams yod do// chang med ne'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams mad
70a5(yum): ro// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
70a6(yum): mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas mo skye mched kyi lha rnams yong ngo // gya mom cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do
70a7(yum): 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod // pa'i pha rom tu phyin pa yodang ngo // tshul khams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod //
70a8(yum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ngo // bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// zhes
70a9(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa yang ngo // nang stong pa 'di yong / byis pa zhing yong ngo / phyi nang song ba zhing yong // song ba zhing srung ba ning yang /
70b1(yum): rang bzhin srung pa nyid yong / chos thams cad snang pa nyid yang /
70b2(yum): mang / ngangam pa stong pa dang yang // 'dus byas song ldan ma/ 'dus ma byas snang pad yang / 'alas sa
70b3(yum): blang ba dang meng // thog ma dang tha ma med pa song ba dang yod do// dor ba med pastong pa zhing yod do// rang gi mtshan ning song ba nying yod /
70b4(yum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa ni
70b5(yum): do// dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par sbyong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod
70b6(yum): stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lags rnams yong ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang ba yong ngo // 'phangs pa'i bden

70b9(yum): pa yod do// mngon par shes par rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stongs
71a1(yum): mas dza/ mas pams mdza/ mas sa par ris pa rnams mang
71a2(yum): yong // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod// chun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yong ngo // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'grus bu yong
71a3(yum): bya me 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod ngo // dam bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod ngo // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa ning yong ngo // rnam pa thams cad
71a4(yum): mkhyen pa nyi yod // rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod ngo // lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams mdzo// phyir mi 'ong brnams yod do// dgra bcom
71a5(yum): pa rnams yod // rang sangs rgyas rnams yong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yong ngo // de bzhin gshegs padas
71a6(yum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mang ngo // koru'i gaslong gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dring ba la nos pa

71a8(yum): 'jo ba'i sa mang sems rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mdo'i bsod rnams de'i rgyas mang dzu kyi ma gsol ba bcom ldan 'das ma
71b1(yum): ba gshegs pa kyang // bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal du pa/ rdzus bas kyang rigs kyi bulam gyis kyi ngam ma
71b2(yum): rab kyi phywa tu phyi 'di'i glegs dam za ba dang / bklag pa dang / kha ton du b+hu ba'i phyir gzhanal byin na/ bsod nams ches mang
71b3(yum): 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u zhi kadzini 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher sa
71b4(yum): de dag la srabs shing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur

72a1(yum): rdzogs pa'i byang chu tu nga ma mangs sa rgyas na// rang dzu // mngon par rdzam

72b2(yum): chub ya la nga/ 'phags pa'i lamamanarnam bcang ba dang 'gas pa' masas/

73a1(yum): yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod ngo do// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams yod // mtshe mo'i lha rnams yod do// dga'
73a2(yum): ldan gyi la rnams yod do// 'dral ga' gyu rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs rigs kyi lha rnams
73a3(yum): yod do// tshangs la nye bar gyi lha rnams yod do// nangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yong ngo // tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i la
