73b1(yum): mtha' las skye mched kyi snyarnams med // rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams mdang // smyung byung med pa'i skye mched rna
73b2(yum): do// 'dra shos med 'du shes med mini skye mched kyi la rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod ngo do// tshul khri mas pa ral tu phyir

73b4(yum): ngo// shes rab kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod ngo // phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa

73b7(yum): pa nyidi yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa sto/

74a1(yum): par tshu gams mdang / dang rnangs mdzang // dadang poms mang du// skabs rnams
74a2(yum): do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do//
74a3(yum): bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms rab 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar
74a4(yum): pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sa spong pa nyid dang / mtsham
74a5(yum): med pa dang // smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// tingange 'dzin rnams yong ngo // de bzhini gzungs sgom
74a6(yum): yod do// de gzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams pa yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med
74a7(yum): snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyi
74a8(yum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yid ngo // rang chub yod ngo do// lam gyi rnam
74b1(yum): shes pa ning yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyeran pa nying yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lam cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yong
74b2(yum): phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// sa brtsam pa rnams mang po/ rnyeng sang sems rnams yong / byang chub sems dngu' sems
74b3(yum): po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// rkardzu na phyogs
74b4(yum): bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jigs rten gyi khams gang gis klung gi bye ma snyed dgan sems can ji snyed cig yod pa dang ga gas kyi bu la
74b5(yum): rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ci snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs
74b6(yum): kyi bu mo de'i bsod rnams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
74b7(yum): bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i
74b8(yum): glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byir na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhen/
75a1(yum): rgyun pa sa/
75a2(yum): skabs shing rigasu bu'am rigs kyi bu mo ga yang dag pa'i skyor med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs
75a3(yum): 'bras bu thob par gyur to// thob po thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras zaza pa par gyur te// tho 'i thob par 'gyur ro//
75a4(yum): bya mi 'ong gA'i 'bras butho ra gyur to// tho pe thob par 'gyur ro// dgra brtsam pa cing thob par gyur / ba po rdzob par 'gyur ro/
75a5(yum): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chubathob par gyur to// tho 'byung par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
75a6(yum): rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod me pa zugs par gyur/ 'jug sol chu par 'gyur ro// rnam ma sa ngas par rdzogs pa'i bya
75a7(yum): chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'amang rtsa bar 'gyur ro//
75b1(yum): khrag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhen/ 'di sa su sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyi ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzong pa
75b2(yum): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang
75b3(yum): banid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don pa dang ba stong pa nyid dang / 'du
75b4(yum): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / 'thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo
75b5(yum): med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin sdong pa nyid dang / ming dmigs pa stong pa ni
75b6(yum): dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / da bang po lnga dang / stobs ldang
75b7(yum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi nga
75b8(yum): dngos po med pa su ba nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa
76a1(yum): mad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs ma snyoms par 'jug pa pa'i dang / rnam par mthar pa brgyad dang
76a2(yum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i sgom par 'jugs pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i so stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang
76a3(yum): mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang de banin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi
76a4(yum): 'jigs pa bzhi dang // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying
76a5(yum): rje chen po dang / dga' chen po dang / bdang snyoms chen po gte/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher snyan to//
76a6(yum): ko'u shi ka rnam grangs nges kyang rigs kyi za'am rigs bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang /
76a7(yum): bri ba dang / 'asngon du bya ba'i rgyu ga nam byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nas ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zher/ ko
76a8(yum): kadon 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher stan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mthob rnams yod do//
76b1(yum): zamatha' rigs che tshang mtho rnams med // khyim bdag gigs che nang / mtho ba rnams yo / rgyal rten
76b2(yum): rnams yod do// sum bcu gsum gyi lnga rnams yod do// ma ma'i lharnams yod do// dga' ldan gyil rnams yod do// 'phrul
76b3(yum): lha rnams yod ngo // gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye bar gyi lha rnams yod ngo // tshungs pa kun 'khor gyi
76b4(yum): rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// sdang ba'i lha rnams yod do// rlung snang gyi lha rnams yod do// chang mong sdang ba
76b5(yum): pAyod do// kun sdang dang nga'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung nga ge'i lha rnams yod do// rang med nga de
76b6(yum): lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// rlung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshang med ni
76b7(yum): lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod de// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams mong ngo // na
76b8(yum): ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom sdang ba'i lha rnams yod ngo // 'og min gyi lha rnams yod ngo do// nas mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyis
77a1(yum): rnams mdzad/ sa mtsha mas skyes ma kyil rnams mdzad// rgya bar med pa mas kyi rnam
77a2(yum): yod do/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
77a3(yum): yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//
77a4(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// na stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod
77a5(yum): do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa ni yong ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod de// mtha'
77a6(yum): 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nying yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do//
77a7(yum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod ngo do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mdzo/ mi dmigs pa stong pa 'ang yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa zhing yang
77a8(yum): // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod ngo do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par
77b1(yum): ba rnams yod do// rdu'aphrul gyi dang pa rnams mdang // dbang po rnams mdzad / stobs rnams mang // byang chub mags
77b2(yum): yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yong ngo // mang
77b3(yum): pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i sgom
77b4(yum): par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod na/
77b5(yum): ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod /
77b6(yum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yong ngo do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
77b7(yum): 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// ngagra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub
77b8(yum): yod do// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nga ngo // rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig
78a1(yum): phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod ngo // rang sangs rgyas ma
78a2(yum): yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnamams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
78a3(yum): rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan gzhis
78a4(yum): bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/
78a5(yum): shi ka de ji snyams du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa ldan
78a6(yum): 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ kau'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gi
78a7(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs pas klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams mang nga 'phel la/
78a8(yum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nis 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher sngan te/ de dag la bsrabs shing rigs
78b1(yum): kyi bu'am rigs kyi ma ga yang dag pa'i sgron med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'ja
78b2(yum): par gyur to// tho ba po thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur ro// thob po thob par 'gyur ro// phyir ma
78b3(yum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// thob po thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid tho ba par gyur to// thob po thob par 'gyur ro// rangs
78b4(yum): rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// thob po thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rna
78b5(yum): kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
78b6(yum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshung rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar la
78b7(yum): shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di ltar ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin bdag
78b8(yum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
79a1(yum): sar la tu gyu bdang / rung zhi dang / blas nga nga / byam dang /
79a2(yum): de stong pa nyid dang / chen po song pa nyid dang / don dam pa spyod pa ning dang / 'dus byas snang ba nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
79a3(yum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang mtha' ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dong ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos
79a4(yum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid srung
79a5(yum): padi dang / dngos pa med pa'i ngas po zhing stong ba nyid dang / ngan panye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par song ba bzhi dang / rnga 'phru
79a6(yum): rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stob dang lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang
79a7(yum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i rdza
79a8(yum): pazhing dang / mtshan meng pa dang sngon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes padrug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
79a9(yum): bsam tan rnams dang / tshad med pa rams dang / gzugs med pa'i spobs par 'jug pa
79b1(yum): gas pa grubs nga/ ma 'dzams pa bad ma yang das par sa pa bskye sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
79b2(yum): dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang stobs chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshang med pa gzhan
79b3(yum): kyang rgya cher stan to// ko'u shig rnam grangs nges kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing
79b4(yum): klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha don du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
79b5(yum): ko& shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya chen bstan to// de dag yod par rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//
79b6(yum): bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yong /
79b7(yum): sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mche ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gnas
79b8(yum): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lnga nye bar phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi ldanam
80a1(yum): rangs rnams mdzang / rang rnam da / nang rnams dang /
80a2(yum): kha'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams mang ngo // dge ba'i lharnams yong ngo // rlung ngapo'i ma rnams med ngo // chang med dge ba
80a3(yum): yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yong ngo // che ba'i larnams yong ngo // rlung che ba'i ldarnarnams yod ngo // nang me che ba'i la rnams yong ngo //
80a4(yum): bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ mi che ba'i la rnams yong ngo // mi gdung ba'i lha rnams medzo// shin tu mthong ba'i lharnam mthong ngo // rtso mam sna
80a5(yum): ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod ngo // nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yong ngo // rnam shes mtha' yas skye ma
80a6(yum): rnams mang // bdu byud med pa'i skye steng larnams mad // 'drags med 'dugs med kyis rnams med /
80a7(yum): sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa medang // tshul khrims pa rol da phyin pa mdzang / mdza bas
80a8(yum): phyin pa yod / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phrin pa yong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi pa mdzod// nang song pa zhing yong ngo /
80b1(yum): da/ b+h+ya stong ma dang // gdu dang dang pan yang nga / pa stong ba ngam dang su
80b2(yum): 'dus rgya song ba ning yod // 'jam ma byas phreng pa nang med// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nang ma // chog mdang tham med pa byeng ngan
80b3(yum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong zhing yod do// rabazhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// ra
80b4(yum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// ming dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//
80b5(yum): po med pa'i ji bo stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rang pa
80b6(yum): yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lags rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya

80b8(yum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sku
81a1(yum): sdong pa ning nga mtshan ma med pa nga stom pa med pa yod / mngon par shes pa rnams yong // ting nge 'dzin rnams mang
81a2(yum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jig pa rnams yod do// sa so yang dag par rig pa rnams
81a3(yum): do/ byams pa chen po yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dzes pa bcom brgyad yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
81a4(yum): yang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yong ngo // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do//
81a5(yum): lam gyi rnams pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ning yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i rnams yod do// lan ci'i phyir 'ong
81a6(yum): rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yong ngo // rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa'

81a8(yum): bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la nog gi/ ko 'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi dul
81b1(yum): rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhil ba song ngo // chang med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon pa
81b2(yum): shes pa lnga la rab tu 'akod na/ kau3 shi ka de cis ma du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bum de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/
81b3(yum): pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo bang par shes pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
81b4(yum): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i blam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha don du bya'i phyir gzhan byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//
81b5(yum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bsla
81b6(yum): shing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
81b7(yum): buthob par gyur to// thob po thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// thob pa thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong
81b8(yum): 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa zhing rdzob par gyur to// thob po thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyis rang byang chu brjod/
81b9(yum): thon po thob par 'gyur ro//
82a1(yum): par gyur to// thob pa thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i dab skyon med par zhugs
82a2(yum): gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs
82a3(yum): par mtshang rgya'o mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par 'gyur ro// ko'ushi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di la ste sbyin pa'i ba
82a4(yum): rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang // bsam
82a5(yum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid byinang stong pa nyi nga /
82a6(yum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid pa nyi dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang //
82a7(yum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang rnam med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang ba ni stong pa nyid dang / chos tham
82a8(yum): cang song banyid dang / rang gi mtsham zhing spong ba nyid stong pa ni dang / me dmigs pa stong pa nying dang / dngos pa med pa spong pazhing dang / nga ba zhid
82b1(yum): yangs nga / ma pa mang pa'ang sang yang sa dang / dang zhi bar gnasag pa na dang / yang das par yang ba /
82b2(yum): nang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lda ngang/ byang chub kyi yan las bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam mam tshig rgya
82b3(yum): padang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bani dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par rung
82b4(yum): rnam par thar pa'i sku stong pa nyid dang / smon par med pa dang / mngon par shes drug dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi snyoms cad ngo /
82b5(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sa so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dzes pa bco
82b6(yum): dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / bdang snyoms chen po dag ste// sangs rgyas kyi chos mang med pa sa//
82b7(yum): dag kyang ner bstanan/ Sh+tsashi karnam grangs nges pa rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bumo gang gis shes rabakyi pha ral tu phyin ba rnams
82b8(yum): du zas shing klag pajid/ chu thob dang/ khadon du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byinan/ de bas 'di bsad rnams ches mang nga 'phel khor zhes pa
83a1(yum): de ci'i bu'i nor/ ko shi ga 'di lta shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la sa chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/
83a2(yum): dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// brazla'i rigs re zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams
83a3(yum): song ngo // rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod ngo do// sum bcun sum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' lha rnams
83a4(yum): yong ngo // 'phrul dgA'i lha rnams yong ngo / gzhan 'phrul bang byed kyil rnams yod do// tshangs rigs kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lan
83a5(yum): pan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// sdang ba'i lha rnams yod do// rlung sna
83a6(yum): gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lhamam
83a7(yum): yod do// chang med dge'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che ba'i lha rnams yod do//
83a8(yum): ming che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras brim pa'i la rnams yod do// min pa'i lha rnams yong ngo // mi gdung ba'i la rnams yod do//
83b1(yum): du mthong ba'i lharnams mdzad// rgyarom snang ba'i lharnams yod / 'ag min gyi lha rnams yod do/ nam mA' grus skye mched kyi ldarnams mdzad
83b2(yum): rnams shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams mangs
83b3(yum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyir ba yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba yod do// brtson 'grus phyi rol tu phyin pa
83b4(yum): do// bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi rang
83b5(yum): pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ 'du
83b6(yum): ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do//
83b7(yum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// da
83b8(yum): po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i po ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
84a1(yum): nga yang dag pa marnams mdzad// rdzu ma gyi dang pa rnams nga // da rnams nga // na
84a2(yum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brkyang ba yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod // bsam gtan rnams yong /
84a3(yum): chang med pa rnams mang ngo // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mdzad/ rnam par thar pa brgyad mad/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i rnams pa
84a4(yum): 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams mad // ti nge 'dzin rnams
84a5(yum): yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod // so so yang dag par rigs pa
84a6(yum): rnams yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yong ngo // snying rje chen tha mad do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod ngo do// lan cig phy-ir 'ong
84a7(yum): 'bras bu mdzad/ mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang ngo // dam bco pa rnams mdzang // nga bya nupa mad/ lam namya pams pa dang me nga/
84a8(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhing yong ngo // rgyan tu tshugs 'arnams yod / lan gyi phyir 'ong ba rnams mdza // phyir ma'ong ba rnams yod do// nga
84b1(yum): btsum pa rnams mdang // rangs sa rgyas rnams mngang // byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rnams yadang / dasmra sa
84b2(yum): bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma // ke'u shes/ snying chen po pa'i pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la 'og/ na
84b3(yum): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems camaji med pa dang ga rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la rabacu bkod do// chang med pa
84b4(yum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de rjes ma du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
84b5(yum): mdo'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis
84b6(yum): bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / zir
84b7(yum): dang / kha dor bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin ni bsod nams ni mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
84b8(yum): las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs bu'am rigs kyi bu mo ga yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs pa
85a1(yum): par gyu / lagyu sol gru / rgyun tu rna gas pa 'grus patsu gyu
85a2(yum): pa gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// thob po thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur
85a3(yum): thob pa thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa ning thob par gyur to// thob po thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyis rang bya
85a4(yum): chu bathob par gyur to// rdzob po thob par 'gyur ro/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa
85a5(yum): zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'gru par 'gyur ro// blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas so
85a6(yum): mngon par rdzogs par 'anang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kol+la shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag tu kyang gang rnan
85a7(yum): lha sre sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi
85a8(yum): dbasam gtan kyi rol byu nga/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa ni dang / byi song pa zhing dang / phyi nang stong panang/
85b1(yum): stong pa nyid stong pa nying dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don pa dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stod pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
85b2(yum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams ca
85b3(yum): stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos
85b4(yum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang
85b5(yum): po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang
85b6(yum): 1/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan med pa dang / mngon
85b7(yum): man pa rnam pa pa shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
85b8(yum): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang
86a1(yum): shAng ba na bang ma nas ste/ mas dang med pa mas pa nan/
86a2(yum): ru'e/ rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang /
86a3(yum): dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan gyi mang/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ni mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir ne na/ ko'u shi ka
86a4(yum): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher stan te/ deng ga yod pas rgyal rigs che ning mtho ba rnams yod ngo // bram ze'i
86a5(yum): rigs me zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs tshe ning mthob mas mang// rgyal chen ba'i ris kyi lha rnams mdzad// sum
86a6(yum): gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mche ma'i lha rnams yod // dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yong ngo // 'dral ngaga'i larnams yod // gnan
86a7(yum): dbang byed kyi lha rnams yong ngo // mangs ris kyi larnams med do// nangs lhan pa mgyi la rnams mdza // tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi la rnams mang
86a8(yum): tshangs chen gyi la rnams mdzod// sdang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yang // mang ranga'i larnams yang ngo // kun sngang dang ba'i la
86b1(yum): dang glu dang / chu rnams mdang / da mau nga ga pa'i marnams mdang/ la/ rgyas da
86b2(yum): lharnams yod // chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i ldacha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yong
86b3(yum): mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom sdang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// na mkha'
86b4(yum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i mched kyi lha rnams yod// 'dun
86b5(yum): med 'du shes med mni skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i
86b6(yum): rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin phyin
86b7(yum): pa yong ngo // nang stong pa nyid yod do/ phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po
86b8(yum): don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa 'di yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyi yod do//
87a1(yum): thog ma dang tham med pa/ stong pa nyid yod do// bya ba med pa ma stong pa nyid yong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod /
87a2(yum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi rdzogs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i stong pa nyid yod do//
87a3(yum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams
87a4(yum): yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod ngo // stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'jag
87a5(yum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do//
87a6(yum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do//
87a7(yum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa smon med pa yod de/ mngon par shes pa rnams yod ngo // snying nge 'dzin rnams med do//
87a8(yum): kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod ngo // mi 'jigs pa rnams yong ngo // sa so yong dag par rig pa rnams yang ngo //
87b1(yum): pa mdzad// sangs rgyas kyi chos mdzes pabacwa brgyad mdzad// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod// lan cig
87b2(yum): zla yong ngo do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
87b3(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyi mi 'ong
87b4(yum): rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
87b5(yum): ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas rnams yod do// shes par gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
87b6(yum): brgyad pa// // dum bu drug pa// / bam po rgyu nyi shu rtsa dgu pa// // ko'u TI ka song gi 'dzin
87b7(yum): rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'ja' bring po'i sems can je snyed pade dag
87b8(yum): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam kyi gtan bzhi la bkod ngo // tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i smos par 'jug pa
88a1(yum): dus sas gyu
88a2(yum): kyi bu modo'i bsod nas de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan
88a3(yum): 'das kyis ka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klags
88a4(yum): ba dang // bri ba dang / kha don bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes
88a5(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher stan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo pa yang dag
88a6(yum): pa'i skyon med par zhugs pam gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// thob 'a thob par 'gyur
88a7(yum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rdzob par gyur to// tho 'i thob par 'gyur ro// li phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// thob po thub
88a8(yum): 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa zhing thob par gyur to// thob po thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyis rang byang chub tho ba par gyur to/
88b1(yum): banapa par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i smon med par zhugs par
88b2(yum): 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon pa
88b3(yum): bar 'chang rgyag// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di la sa
88b4(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pang
88b5(yum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid
88b6(yum): dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang // 'dus ma byas stong pa
88b7(yum): nyi dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang
88b8(yum): bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po me
89a1(yum): pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid song pa ning dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / ngar pa
89a2(yum): gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi ya la
89a3(yum): bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lags brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
89a4(yum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes
89a5(yum): padrug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
89a6(yum): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje
89a7(yum): chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang // gtang snyoms chen po gA ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos chang med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstun
89a8(yum): ko'u shi ka rnam grangs nges kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klags
89a9(yum): pa dang / bri ba dang / kha don du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod rnams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir rnam
89a10(yum): ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te// de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che ming mdzu ba rnams
89a11(yum): yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yong ngo // khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi
89a12(yum): lnga rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs la nye par gyi lha rnams yong ngo // tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams
89a13(yum): yod do/ snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshang med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang ba'i lha rnams yod
89a14(yum): do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi ldarnams meng ngo //
89a15(yum): ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chang med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras
89a16(yum): bun+de ba'i la rnams yod ngo // mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod ngo // shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom spang ba'i lha rnams yong do
90a1(yum): mas ma / rdzu sa rgyadu/
90a2(yum): las skye mched kyi lha rnams yod// chung zang byed pa'i skye mched kyi lharnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med pa'i skyem ched
90a3(yum): rnams yod do// sbyi pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims ky-i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzong pa'ipha rol tu gyur ba la
90a4(yum): de/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyir pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
90a5(yum): rlung stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yong ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid yod/ stong pa nyid stong ba nang yod // chen po song zhing 'ang
90a6(yum): don dam pa stong zhing yod ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nying yong ngo // 'dus ma thus spong ba zhing yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nang mi
90a7(yum): / ma nga tha ma med pa snang ba ni ma // da med snang mdzo// rang ba 'i sring pa nga mdzang // rgyas rnams
90a8(yum): nga sa ci mang // rang gi mtsha mang dzo mang mang // maung rigs pazung ba'i mang // dngos kyi meng paslong pa nang mdzang/
90b1(yum): 'dzu/ sa pa med ma sa ma / rngan panye bar bamag rnams yang / yang dag pa
90b2(yum): // rdzu 'phrul gyi sang pa rnams la dang // dab rnams mad / stobs rnams yang ngo // byang chub kyi yam sa rnams
90b3(yum): 'phags pa'o lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod ngo do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med
90b4(yum): rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par mthar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas par
90b5(yum): snyoms par 'jug par rnams yod dang // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang // smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes
90b6(yum): pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi
90b7(yum): 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs
90b8(yum): pa'i 'bras bu yod do// las cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nying yod do//
91a1(yum): rang byang chub mang du// lam gyirnam par shes pa nyid yod // rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nying yod/
91a2(yum): rgyun tu tshugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// byar mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yodan//
91a3(yum): rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
91a4(yum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kauT shi ka snod kyi gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ko&
91a5(yum): shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'dzag rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan
91a6(yum): bzhi la bkod do// tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga larab tu bkod na/
91a7(yum): ko'u shi ka de ci snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bram de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom
91a8(yum): ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am/
91b1(yum): rigs kyi bumo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzi'i glegs pam sdug pa dang / ze ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gas
91b2(yum): bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med
91b3(yum): chos rnams rgya cher bstan te// de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo ga yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyu
91b4(yum): to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// thob po thob par 'gyur ro// len ci
91b5(yum): ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// tho ba po thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur ro// thong po thob par 'gyur
91b6(yum): dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// thob po thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to//
91b7(yum): thob po thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs pa
91b8(yum): gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur to// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas sa
92a1(yum): mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyuraro// kaD+D+h+ya ka zag pa med pa
92a2(yum): chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang // bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /
92a3(yum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi snong
92a4(yum): pazhing dang / phyi ning stong pa nyid dang / phyi dang stong pa nyid dang // stong pa nying stong pa nyid dang // chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang
92a5(yum): 'das byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang // thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid dang /
92a6(yum): dor ba med pa song pa nying dang / rang ba nin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong ba nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / ming mchis
92a7(yum): bsong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang // ngo bos nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa ning dang / dranang nyes
92a8(yum): gnag pa bzhing ba yang dag par bstong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi nga/ dbang po lda nga / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi
92b1(yum): yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar par brgyad dang /
92b2(yum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang mngon par
92b3(yum): shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gla zungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'dzags
92b4(yum): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen
92b5(yum): dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang gzhan rgya cher snyan to// koT
92b6(yum): karnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing za ga pa dang / bri bdang
92b7(yum): kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
92b8(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher stan ste/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze
93a1(yum): rigs ma mdzab tharnams mang // khyim pa ga gi rigs kyi me mdzo rnams yo nga/ rgyal che
93a2(yum): kyilha rnams yod ngo // sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// ts+tsho ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga'aldan gyi la rnams yod do/ 'phrul dag
93a3(yum): lha rnams yod ngo do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lnga rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do//
93a4(yum): dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi la rnams yod /
93a5(yum): tshangs ldanye par gyi la rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod
93a6(yum): rlung snang gil rnams yod do// mang med spang ba'i la rnams yang ngo // kur snang dang ba'i lharnams yod do// tshad mi snang ba'i lha rnams mangs
93a7(yum): klan snang dang ba'i lharnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod ngo // chung dge'e khrims yod do// tshang med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// daci
93a8(yum): kyi lha rnams yod ngo // che ba'i lha rnams yong ngo // chung che ba'i lha rnams meng ngo // tshang med che ba'i lha rnams yod // 'bras bu che ba'i lamam
93b1(yum): sa mdzad// na mdzang / byang ba'is nums ma dang/
93b2(yum): rnas mang/ mas mang // rnam mkha' man mas skye ma tshad kyil rnams med/ ma zhes mtha' sa
93b3(yum): kyi lha rnams mngango // rlung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med mchi skye mched kyi lha rnams mdzod
93b4(yum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi
93b5(yum): rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do/

94a1(yum): da/ /
94a2(yum): nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nyeng bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par sbyong ba rnams yongon
94a3(yum): rlu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yong ngo // stobs rnams yod // byang chub kyi yar lag rnams yong ngo // 'phags

97a7(yum): thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod de/ ming migs pa stong nyid yod ngo // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod ngo // ngo

97b1(yum): mang ngo // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod// dbang po rnams yang nga // stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lags rnams mang

97b8(yum): yod do// lam gyi rnams pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig
98a1(yum): mdzang/ ma ma / sa
98a2(yum): yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
98a3(yum): rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka lho phyogs kyi 'jigs rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ci snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs
98a4(yum): phyi bu'am rigs kyi bu'amo la las bsam gtan ni la bkod do// tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jugs pa bzhin dang /
98a5(yum): mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de mA sar snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mda' bsod rnams de'i rgyus ma
98a6(yum): du 'phel lam/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rbA shi ka bas
98a7(yum): kye bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang // ze ba dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gan
98a8(yum): narasod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir 'om/ kau'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i
98b1(yum): chos rnams rgya cher snyan te// de dag la bsabs shing gis kyi bu'am rigs kyi bramo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur
98b2(yum): 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// thob po thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig pu'i 'ong
98b3(yum): 'bras bu thob par gyur to// tho ba po thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// thob po thob par 'gyur ro/
98b4(yum): dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// thob pa thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par
98b5(yum): gyur to// thob po thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa
98b6(yum): zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
98b7(yum): rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o bar 'gyur ro// kau'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos
98b8(yum): de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
99a1(yum): padang / d+hAs pa rab tu N+Di byung ga phyir la ba
99a2(yum): phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don
99a3(yum): dam pa stong pa nyid dang // 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang
99a4(yum): mamed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang ba na ni stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan na
99a5(yum): stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i
99a6(yum): nying stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bani dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pazhi dang / dbang po ldad /
99a7(yum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdur dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brkyang ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
99a8(yum): rnam par thar pa rgyang dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sa snang bzhing dang / mtshanamam
99b1(yum): pa dang / so nga med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi so thams cad dang
99b2(yum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
99b3(yum): pa bcom brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sang
99b4(yum): rgyas kyi chos tshad ma gzhan dag kyang rgya cher stan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs nges kyang rigs kyi khu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis
99b5(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing // klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya'i phyir gzhan byin no// de bas

100a1(yum): sum gyi lha rnams yod ngo do// mtshe ma'i ldarnams yod do// dga' ldan gyil rnams mngang /

105a9(yum): thob par 'gyur
105b1(yum): / rnams kyis rang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur na// 'junan

105b4(yum): phyin dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyis
105b5(yum): rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
105b6(yum): dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang // don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
105b7(yum): dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / tho ga ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
105b8(yum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / de za stong pa
106a1(yum): 'ji zhi nga dngos pa mang 'ang ma nang snang ba nga pa ba par nag pa ni dang / yang dag par snang ba
106a2(yum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam brgyad pa dang / 'phag
106a3(yum): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tharab brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar ze'i ma rung pa ning da
106a4(yum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de ba ni
106a5(yum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
106a6(yum): dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang // dpa' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos chad med pa gan
106a7(yum): dag kyang rgya cher snyan to// Sh+mA shi ka rnam grangs nges kyang / rigs kyi bum rigs kyi bu'am gang gis shes rab kyi rab tu phyin pa glegs pa
106a8(yum): dmas sang lag pa pa dang / zi bdang/ kha don du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin nas/ de bas 'dzi'i bas rnams ches mang du 'phel ya shes par
106b1(yum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shi ka de ni 'di rigs las zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ deng g.yod pas rgyal rigs che mi ma
106b2(yum): rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che ning mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi
106b3(yum): lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtsho ma'i lha rnams yod do// dba' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul ba'i
106b4(yum): rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul bang byed kyi lnga rnams yod do/ 6/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lnga de phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ mangs
106b5(yum): pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung sdang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med
106b6(yum): snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung nga de'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i
106b7(yum): lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod ngo // chung che'i lha rnams yod do// nang med che ba'i lha rnams yod do//
106b8(yum): 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// yo mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod ngo do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// byam//
107a1(yum): rlung sa / 'dus la dang sa du
107a2(yum): rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med
107a3(yum): skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyad pa dum bu drug pa// / bam po rgya sum

107a5(yum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bas ma gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ngo // nang stong pa nang

113a7(yum): 'phrul bang byed kyi lha rnams mdang / mangs rigs kyi lha rnams mengang / tshangs ma dzin gyi lha rnams yang nga // tshangs pa kun 'ar
113a8(yum): rnams sang/ sa chen gyi la rnams mang nga/ snang ba'i marnams mang chung slong sa mnams mdzad ma me na pa'i rnams
113b1(yum): sa ma rnams na dang / chung ngan marnams ma / sa pa'i kha rnams padang/
113b2(yum): rnams yod ngo // re ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// chang med che'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams ma
113b3(yum): mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ 'o
113b4(yum): man gI lha rnams yod do// nam 'kha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye rnyed kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad
113b5(yum): med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'dus shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod
113b6(yum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod ngo do// bsam gtan
113b7(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nid yod do// bye stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/
113b8(yum): pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod ngo // 'dus ma byas stong
114a1(yum): mdang / mang 'alas na 'dzung/ nga bsgyang na mdzang// nga
114a2(yum): pa zhing yod ngo do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod ngo do// chos thams cad snang ba nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid sdong pa ni yong ngo // mi dmigs pabastong pa
114a3(yum): nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// drangar pa nyeng bar
114a4(yum): gzugs pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams
114a5(yum): yong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// da 'phags pa'i lam yang lag brgyang pa yang ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mngad/ @
114a6(yum): gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa rnams yod do//
114a7(yum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jugs pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sku stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yang/
114a8(yum): mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mdza/
114b1(yum): mi gas rnams mdang // mas yang dag par rig pa rnams mdzang/ lus yang dag par rig parnams ma // pa mdzad/
114b2(yum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i
114b3(yum): 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yod do/ rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyi
114b4(yum): yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod ngo // dgra bcom pa rnams yod do//
114b5(yum): rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par
114b6(yum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi kalho nub kyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag
114b7(yum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi nga la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
114b8(yum): mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkong na/ ko'u shi ka de ci snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam
115a1(yum): smrasal pa bcom la 'dus rlu / khade sa/ ma lan 'dus kyi
115a2(yum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / ze bdang / khaton bya ba'i phyir na byi
115a3(yum): bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir she na/ ko'u shi ka ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya rgyar
115a4(yum): stan te/ de dag la srabs shing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro//
115a5(yum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro// tho po zab par 'gyur ro// la na cig phyi'i 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// tho ba mthob par
115a6(yum): ro/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'azas bu thob par gyur to// thob pa thob par 'gyur ro/ dgra bcom pa zhing thob par gyur to// byeb ma thob par 'gyuraro/
115a7(yum): 'angasangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chubaza pa par gyur to/ rdzim ma thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dzin parnam
115a8(yum): chu sams byang mangs zugs pa rgya / 'ju ga ja #// kha med pa la ngas par rdza ma rgya rgya
115b1(yum): yug # sa #@
115b2(yum): de dag kyang gang zher/ 'di la sa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyir pa dang / tshul khrims pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'phru
115b3(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gton gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang po
115b4(yum): dang / stong pa zhi stong pa nyid dang / chen pa rna snang po zhing dang / dorangs pa stong pa ning ngo / 'dus byas stong pa zhing dang / 'dus ma byas song ba ni
115b5(yum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma ngang tha med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa spyod pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong
115b6(yum): dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngon
115b7(yum): nyi stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs
115b8(yum): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang
116a1(yum): sa gyis sa pa'i sgyus la ga / sgyu cu yang da
116a2(yum): pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / nge 'dzin thams ca gzungs kyi sgo thams ca dang / de tsha gshegs pa'i stongs
116a3(yum): dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sos yang dag par rig pa pa'i dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa co rgyang dang / byams pa chen po
116a4(yum): snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mang med bka' na dag kyang rgya cher stan no//
116a5(yum): she ka rnams grangs des kyang ma rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bumo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pab rtsegs pam du bris shing klas pa dang / zangs/
116a6(yum): khaton bya ba'i phyir gzhan gyir/ de bas 'di'i bsong nas ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// ji ci'i phyir che na/ kol+la shi ka de ni 'di lta
116a7(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher sngar te/ ded ga yod pas rgyal rigs che ning mtho rnams mdza// rgyal rims mi
116a8(yum): mthab rnams mang // bram tsho'i rigs mi ring mdze ba rnams mang / khyim bangag gi rigs che ba zhing mtho ba rnams mdzad// rgyal chem pa'i
116b1(yum): ris snre la rnams yod// sum bcu rtsags kyi lha rnams yod ngo // sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yang ngo / mtsha ma'i lha rnams yod do//
116b2(yum): ldan gyi lha rnams yod ngo // 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod ngo do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi la rnams mdzad
116b3(yum): tshangs man par gyil gyi la rnams med / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams mang ngo // tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yong ngo // snang ba'i ltarnams
116b4(yum): do// rlung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod //
116b5(yum): rlung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams
116b6(yum): yod ngo do// chang med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//
116b7(yum): tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod ngo // gya rlom sdang ba'i lharnams yang de/ 'og man gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' las m+b+ha ste mched kyi lha rnams
116b8(yum): yong// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyil rnams yong ngo // cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod // 'ad byes med 'du shes med man/
117a1(yum): la rnams mdzang/ spya pa'i ba mdzang/ nAl rnams /
117a2(yum): rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin mang ngo // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin yong
117a3(yum): bsam san gyi macom tu phyin pa mang // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nying mdzad/ byi na pa stong ba nyid yod do// byin
117a4(yum): stong pa zhing mang ngo // spong ba zhing stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yo // don dam pa stong pa nyid mang dang // 'dus byas stong pa

117b7(yum): za yong ngo // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma nga // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mang ngo // dgra bcom pa nyid yong ngo // rang byang chu ba yong
117b8(yum): gyi rnams pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan ci gA pAri 'ong ba rnams ma

118a3(yum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'a gas chen gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi byem byed sed kyi// sems ca ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu

118a5(yum): bkod ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi drilan gyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das

118a7(yum): gyi ma tshun du 'dzi rmugs 'byu dang chu ma nam sa ma

120a1(yum): chen ni lhurnams dang mang bya ma ba ngag rgyams sa nga rlung cheng na

120b1(yum): dasnang ba nang yang / mamam zung ba dang mdang // dmangs pa snang pa nang ya nga / 'dus byas stong pa nyidang yod do// 'dras ma byas nga

120b3(yum): mdzad// dusarnams ca srung banyid mad// rlung gi nam ning stong ba nyid mdang/ mi migs pa stong pa nyid mdzod// dngos pa ma
120b4(yum): pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stod bya nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod ngo // dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams yod do// yang dag
120b5(yum): bar spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan la
120b6(yum): rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do//

120b8(yum): par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang // mtshan mamed ba dang / snrums pa med pa yong ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams
121a1(yum): mdzad// ngal mi rnams mdzang // gzungs kyi rnams mdzad// na nags pa 'a yongs su mdzad/
121a2(yum): 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bco brgyad do// rgyum
121a3(yum): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang bya
121a4(yum): chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa zhing yong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan tshus phyi
121a5(yum): kha rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems da
121a6(yum): chen po rnams yod ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// rko Sh+Ta shi ka 'on gi phyogs kyi
121a7(yum): 'jigs rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'o las bsam gtan
121a8(yum): la bkod de/ tshang med pa pa'i dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bani dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/
121b1(yum): kado'i samangasams/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mdze'i gsang nams de'i rgyus ma du 'phel ltam// smras pa bam ldan 'das mdza
121b2(yum): bde bar gzhi gas pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa// koSh+ma ni 'de bas rims kyi bu'am rigs kyi bum dang gis zhes
121b3(yum): rol tu phyin pa 'a glegs bamag+na kla ga pa dang / bri ba dang / bton bya ba'i phyir gzham byin ma de bas 'di'i bsod rnams ches mang du 'phel bar shes pa
121b4(yum): bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kon+do shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nga las zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te// de dgag
121b5(yum): bslabs shing rigs kyi bum rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu nus
121b6(yum): ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur to// thob po thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro// thob pa thob par 'gyur rje
121b7(yum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur to// thob po thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur to// thob po thob par 'gyur ro//
121b8(yum): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
122a1(yum): lhumab nga sa sa sa
122a2(yum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon pa dzegs pa ra// mang 'i rdzogs
122a3(yum): rgyas pa gyur// ma
122a4(yum): phyin pa dang / bzang pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / btsan 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bosam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang shes
122a5(yum): ma su phyin pa dang / nang srung ba zhing dang phyir snang pa zhi nga / snang ba ni snang ba ni dang / ngam rung ba ning ngo // danangs pasung

122a7(yum): za pa dang / dngas pa ming bgrang ba'i rangs pa sam myong zhi nga / nga na
122b1(yum): na dang / yang dag par song ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / su bas lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
122b2(yum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang ba dang / 'phags pa'i 'dzin pa bani dang / rnamathar pa brgyang dang / mthar gyis gams pa'i snyoms par 'dzu
122b3(yum): dgra dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
122b4(yum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
122b5(yum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste sangs rgyas
122b6(yum): kyi chos tshad med pa bzhin dag kyang rgya cher snyan to// kau'u shi ka rnam grangs nges kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
122b7(yum): pa glegs bam du zis shing klag pa dang / ze ba dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par

123a1(yum): rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yong ngo // bram ze'i rigs che ning mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che ning mtho
123a2(yum): ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi la rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// me ma'i lha rnams yong ngo // ngaga'i
123a3(yum): gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dgA'i wa rnams yong ngo / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// mangs mas kyi lha rnams yong //

123a5(yum): // chu snang gi lha rnams yod do// chang med sdang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i wa rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod ngo do// chung

123b1(yum): rje mched kyilha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyil rnams mang ngo // chung bad med pa'i skye mched kyil rnams yod ngo // 'dzun
123b2(yum): ming 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i rol tu phyin phyir pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong

123b4(yum): tu phyin pa yod do// rang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa zhing yod ngo // phyi nang stong pa zhing yod do// stong ba zhing stong pa zhing yod ngo // chen po stong pa

123b7(yum): stong pa nyid yod ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa spong ba nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod ngo // ji ba na
123b8(yum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yong dag par rdzon
124a1(yum): ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yong ngo // stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag
124a2(yum): rnams ma / 'phags pa'i 'am yamal bzung ba yong ma // 'phags pa'i 'dzir 'arnams ma // bsamagatan rnams med /

127b1(yum): mazugs ma pa' rnams par 'jug pa pa dang / mngan pa shes pa la lar rab tu 'gong bas nam man/ sangs ma thu ma'

127b3(yum): mang ba'i snyoms par 'jug par ba'i dang / mngon par shes pa lnga las rab tu ba'ang bas ni ma yinan/ de la tshul kha bzhin yid la byed pa
127b4(yum): ni 'di yin te// gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyad pa yang ma yin pa'i zlos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa
127b5(yum): kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin mi gnyi
127b6(yum): spyang pa yang ma yin pa'i blos bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa
127b7(yum): tshul bzhin tu 'ang la byed pa'o// gnyis la sbyong ba yang ma yin/ mi gnyis pal sbyong ba yang ma yin pa'i blos/ brtson 'grus kyi pha
127b8(yum): rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byeng pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// de nyisaHla/
128a1(yum): spyod pa yang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i zlos bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa/ kun chub par
128a2(yum): byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / rgyal bzhim du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang

128a4(yum): bya'o// gnyis la stong pa yang ma la ni/ me gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yi nga'i blos sbyin ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kung chub par
128a5(yum): bdeng / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yongal byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin
128a6(yum): blos nang stong ba nyid tshul bzhin du ying la byed pa'o// gnyis la sbyang ba yang ma man/ mi gnas pa 'i spyong pa yang ma yi pa'i blos phyir slong
128a7(yum): rgyal bzhin du yid la byed do// gnyis la sbyong ba yang ma ma mo gnyis pa la sbyong ba yang ma ying ba'i chos phyinang spong bzhi'i tshul na min du
128a8(yum): la byed pa'o// gnasi la spyong pa yang ma yin mi gnyis pa la sbyong ba yang ma yinanga'i smos stong pa zhing myong ba tshul bzhim du yi la byed pa'o//
128b1(yum): ba yang gnas pa la spyang ba yang ma mnanga' nan tha byung sa tshul brnam su 'a la byed par/ gnas pa snang pa
128b2(yum): mi gan sa la spyong ba yang ma yi pa'o zlas ngo ra dam pa stong pa nyid rtul ba'i mdu ya la byed du/ gnas la spang pa yang ma la mi gnas pa
128b3(yum): spyong pa yang ma yin pa'i blos 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshul gzhin du yad la byed do// gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang
128b4(yum): ma yin pa'i blos 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshul gnan du ya la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spong ba yang ma yin

129a5(yum): spong ba rnams tshul ba non du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa yang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yin pa'i blos rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
129a6(yum): rgyal ba na du yi la byed pa'o// gnas la spyong pa yang ma mchis gnyis pa la spyod pa yang ma yi ba'i blos dbang po rnams rgyal du mi du yangs
129a7(yum): bying bar// gnyis la spong pa l+li t+yA'i zlas stobs rnams tshul ba mi mngal byed pa'o// gnyis la stong pa 'ang mal mo gnyis pa la spyang
129a8(yum): pa yang ma yin pa'i thos byed chub kyi yan los bdun tshul ba'i du yid la byed ba'o// gnyis la stong pa yang ma yin mi gnyis pa la sbyang

129b2(yum): sbyong mang ba la ba'i blos 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams tshul pa med lang la byed pa'o// gnyis la spring pa yang ma mchi mi gnyis pa

143b2(yum): 'byung ro// de gang de dag sgra mi rtag go zhes bya bar rdeg pa dang / snga sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sgra bdag med do zhes bya bar rdeg pa dang / ska ma sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas

143b4(yum): zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod do/ sul bstan pa de dag kyang dri mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//
